trans-unit.source: Provides a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> for a file, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous read and write operations.
trans-unit.target: 為檔案提供 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />，同時支援同步與非同步讀取和寫入作業。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileStream> class to read from, write to, open, and close files on a file system, and to manipulate other file-related operating system handles, including pipes, standard input, and standard output.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileStream>類別來讀取、 寫入，開啟和關閉檔案在檔案系統上，以及管理其他檔案相關的作業系統控制代碼，包括管道、 標準的輸入和標準輸出。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Write%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyTo%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Flush%2A> methods to perform synchronous operations, or the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.ReadAsync%2A>, <xref:System.IO.FileStream.WriteAsync%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.FileStream.FlushAsync%2A> methods to perform asynchronous operations.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Read%2A>， <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Write%2A>， <xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyTo%2A>，和<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Flush%2A>方法，用以執行同步作業時，或<xref:System.IO.FileStream.ReadAsync%2A>， <xref:System.IO.FileStream.WriteAsync%2A>， <xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%2A>，和<xref:System.IO.FileStream.FlushAsync%2A>執行非同步的方法作業。

trans-unit.source: Use the asynchronous methods to perform resource-intensive file operations without blocking the main thread.
trans-unit.target: 使用非同步方法，而不會封鎖主執行緒中執行需要大量資源的檔案作業。

trans-unit.source: This performance consideration is particularly important in a [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] app or [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working.
trans-unit.target: 這項效能考量對於 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 應用程式或 [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] 應用程式而言特別重要，尤其是針對耗時的資料流作業可能會阻礙 UI 執行緒，使應用程式看起來像是停止運作的情況。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.FileStream> buffers input and output for better performance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileStream> 輸入緩衝區和輸出，以提升效能。

trans-unit.source: This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此類型會實作<xref:System.IDisposable>介面。

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節<xref:System.IDisposable>介面 > 主題。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileStream.IsAsync%2A> property detects whether the file handle was opened asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileStream.IsAsync%2A>屬性會偵測是否為非同步開啟檔案控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: You specify this value when you create an instance of the <xref:System.IO.FileStream> class using a constructor that has an `isAsync`, `useAsync`, or `options` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立的執行個體時，指定這個值<xref:System.IO.FileStream>類別使用的建構函式`isAsync`， `useAsync`，或`options`參數。

trans-unit.source: When the property is `true`, the stream utilizes overlapped I/O to perform file operations asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 若屬性是`true`，資料流使用重疊的 I/O，以非同步方式執行檔案作業。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.IsAsync%2A> property does not have to be `true` to call the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.ReadAsync%2A>, <xref:System.IO.FileStream.WriteAsync%2A>, or <xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.IO.FileStream.IsAsync%2A>屬性不一定要`true`呼叫<xref:System.IO.FileStream.ReadAsync%2A>， <xref:System.IO.FileStream.WriteAsync%2A>，或<xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.IsAsync%2A> property is `false` and you call the asynchronous read and write operations, the UI thread is still not blocked, but the actual I/O operation is performed synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.IO.FileStream.IsAsync%2A>屬性是`false`和呼叫的非同步讀取和寫入作業，仍不封鎖 UI 執行緒，但實際的 I/O 作業會以同步方式執行。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Seek%2A> method supports random access to files.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Seek%2A>方法支援隨機存取檔案。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Seek%2A> allows the read/write position to be moved to any position within the file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Seek%2A> 允許讀取/寫入位置移到檔案中的任何位置。

trans-unit.source: This is done with byte offset reference point parameters.
trans-unit.target: 做法是使用位元組位移的參考點參數。

trans-unit.source: The byte offset is relative to the seek reference point, which can be the beginning, the current position, or the end of the underlying file, as represented by the three members of the <xref:System.IO.SeekOrigin> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 位元組位移是相對於可以開頭、 目前的位置或基礎的檔案，結尾所表示的三個成員的搜尋參考點<xref:System.IO.SeekOrigin>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Disk files always support random access.
trans-unit.target: 磁碟檔案一定會支援隨機存取。

trans-unit.source: At the time of construction, the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanSeek%2A> property value is set to `true` or `false` depending on the underlying file type.If the underlying file type is FILE_TYPE_DISK, as defined in winbase.h, the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanSeek%2A> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 在建構時<xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanSeek%2A>屬性值設定為`true`或`false`根據基礎的檔案類型。如果基礎的檔案類型是 FILE_TYPE_DISK，定義在 winbase.h，<xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanSeek%2A>屬性值是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanSeek%2A> property value is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 否則，<xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanSeek%2A>屬性值是`false`。

trans-unit.source: If a process terminates with part of a file locked or closes a file that has outstanding locks, the behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果處理程序會終止，並鎖定檔案的一部分，或關閉具有未處理的鎖定的檔案，則行為是未定義。

trans-unit.source: For directory operations and other file operations, see the <xref:System.IO.File>, <xref:System.IO.Directory>, and <xref:System.IO.Path> classes.
trans-unit.target: 目錄作業及其他檔案的作業，請參閱<xref:System.IO.File>， <xref:System.IO.Directory>，和<xref:System.IO.Path>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.File> class is a utility class that has static methods primarily for the creation of <xref:System.IO.FileStream> objects based on file paths.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.File>類別是公用程式類別的靜態方法主要是用於建立<xref:System.IO.FileStream>物件為基礎的檔案路徑。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream> class creates a stream from a byte array and is similar to the <xref:System.IO.FileStream> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>類別從位元組陣列中建立的資料流，類似於<xref:System.IO.FileStream>類別。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common file and directory operations, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需常見的檔案和目錄作業的清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: Detection of Stream Position Changes
trans-unit.target: 偵測資料流位置變更

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.IO.FileStream> object does not have an exclusive hold on its handle, another thread could access the file handle concurrently and change the position of the operating system's file pointer that is associated with the file handle.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.IO.FileStream>物件沒有其控制代碼的獨佔的按住不放，另一個執行緒可能同時存取的檔案控制代碼和變更的檔案控制代碼相關聯的作業系統的檔案指標的位置。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the cached position in the <xref:System.IO.FileStream> object and the cached data in the buffer could be compromised.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，快取的位置中<xref:System.IO.FileStream>物件和快取的緩衝區中的資料可能會遭到洩露。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileStream> object routinely performs checks on methods that access the cached buffer to ensure that the operating system's handle position is the same as the cached position used by the <xref:System.IO.FileStream> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileStream>物件定期執行檢查存取快取的緩衝區，以確保作業系統的控制代碼的位置與快取所使用的位置相同的方法上<xref:System.IO.FileStream>物件。

trans-unit.source: If an unexpected change in the handle position is detected in a call to the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Read%2A> method, the .NET Framework discards the contents of the buffer and reads the stream from the file again.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫中偵測到未預期的變更控制代碼的位置中<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Read%2A>方法時，.NET Framework 會捨棄緩衝區的內容，並再次從檔案讀取資料流。

trans-unit.source: This can affect performance, depending on the size of the file and any other processes that could affect the position of the file stream.
trans-unit.target: 這可能會影響效能，大小的檔案和任何其他處理程序可能會影響檔案資料流的位置而定。

trans-unit.source: If an unexpected change in the handle position is detected in a call to the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Write%2A> method, the contents of the buffer are discarded and an <xref:System.IO.IOException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫中偵測到未預期的變更控制代碼的位置中<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Write%2A>方法，將緩衝區的內容會被捨棄，<xref:System.IO.IOException>擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.FileStream> object will not have an exclusive hold on its handle when either the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.SafeFileHandle%2A> property is accessed to expose the handle or the <xref:System.IO.FileStream> object is given the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.SafeFileHandle%2A> property in its constructor.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.IO.FileStream>物件並不會獨佔的按住不放上其控制代碼時任一<xref:System.IO.FileStream.SafeFileHandle%2A>要公開控制代碼存取屬性或<xref:System.IO.FileStream>物件會得到<xref:System.IO.FileStream.SafeFileHandle%2A>其建構函式中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates some of the <xref:System.IO.FileStream> constructors.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範部分<xref:System.IO.FileStream>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to write to a file asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何以非同步方式寫入至檔案。

trans-unit.source: This code runs in a WPF app that has a TextBlock named UserInput and a button hooked up to a Click event handler that is named Button_Click.
trans-unit.target: 具有名為 u 和 連接到名為 Button_Click Click 事件處理常式按鈕 TextBlock 的 WPF 應用程式中執行此程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The file path needs to be changed to a file than exits on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 檔案路徑必須變更為比結束的電腦上的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A file handle for the file that the current <see langword="FileStream" /> object will encapsulate.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see langword="FileStream" /> 物件將會封裝之檔案的檔案控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: A constant that sets the <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanRead" /> and <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite" /> properties of the <see langword="FileStream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 常數，設定 <see langword="FileStream" /> 物件的 <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanRead" /> 與 <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> class for the specified file handle, with the specified read/write permission.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的讀取/寫入權限，初始化指定檔案控制代碼之 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A> is called, the handle is also closed and the file's handle count is decremented.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A>是呼叫，此控制代碼，也會關閉和檔案的控制碼計數會遞減。

trans-unit.source: `FileStream` assumes that it has exclusive control over the handle.
trans-unit.target: `FileStream` 假設它有控制代碼的專有控制權。

trans-unit.source: Reading, writing, or seeking while a `FileStream` is also holding a handle could result in data corruption.
trans-unit.target: 讀取、 寫入，或搜尋時`FileStream`也持有控制代碼可能會導致資料損毀。

trans-unit.source: For data safety, call <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Flush%2A> before using the handle, and avoid calling any methods other than `Close` after you are done using the handle.
trans-unit.target: 針對資料安全呼叫<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Flush%2A>之前使用此控制代碼，並避免呼叫任何方法以外`Close`完成之後使用此控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable, and could cause an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用特定文化特性設定進行編譯的一組字元，並擷取相同的字元具有不同的文化特性設定時，這些字元可能會無法解譯，，而且可能會造成擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: `FileShare.Read` is the default for those <xref:System.IO.FileStream> constructors without a `FileShare` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `FileShare.Read` 這些是預設值<xref:System.IO.FileStream>建構函式不含`FileShare`參數。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common file and directory operations, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需常見的檔案和目錄作業的清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="access" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileAccess" /> 的欄位。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error, such as a disk error, occurred.
trans-unit.target: 發生 I/O 錯誤，例如磁碟錯誤。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The stream has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 資料流已關閉。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="access" /> requested is not permitted by the operating system for the specified file handle, such as when <paramref name="access" /> is <see langword="Write" /> or <see langword="ReadWrite" /> and the file handle is set for read-only access.
trans-unit.target: 指定之檔案控制代碼的作業系統不允許所要求的 <paramref name="access" />，例如，當 <paramref name="access" /> 為 <see langword="Write" /> 或 <see langword="ReadWrite" />，而檔案控制代碼設定成唯讀存取時。

trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />，和<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Append" />。

trans-unit.source: A relative or absolute path for the file that the current <see langword="FileStream" /> object will encapsulate.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see langword="FileStream" /> 物件將會封裝之檔案的相對或絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: A constant that determines how to open or create the file.
trans-unit.target: 常數，決定如何開啟或建立檔案。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> class with the specified path and creation mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的路徑和建立模式初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework does not support direct access to physical disks through paths that are device names, such as "\\\\.\PHYSICALDRIVE0 ".
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 不支援直接存取實體磁碟，透過路徑的裝置名稱，例如"\\\\。 \PHYSICALDRIVE0"。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter can be a file name, including a file on a Universal Naming Convention (UNC) share.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數可以是檔案名稱，包括通用命名慣例 (UNC) 共用上的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The constructor is given read/write access to the file, and it is opened sharing Read access (that is, requests to open the file for writing by this or another process will fail until the `FileStream` object has been closed, but read attempts will succeed).
trans-unit.target: 建構函式可以讀取/寫入存取檔案，並開啟共用讀取權限 (亦即，若要開啟檔案以供寫入這個或另一個處理序將失敗，直到要求`FileStream`物件已關閉，但嘗試讀取則會成功)。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this constructor to open read-only files; instead, you must use a constructor that accepts a `FileAccess` parameter with the value set to `FileAccess.Read`.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用這個建構函式來開啟唯讀檔案;相反地，您必須使用的建構函式可接受`FileAccess`參數值設為`FileAccess.Read`。

trans-unit.source: The buffer size is set to the default size of 4096 bytes (4 KB).
trans-unit.target: 緩衝區大小設定為 4096 個位元組 (4 KB) 的預設大小。

trans-unit.source: `path` is not required to be a file stored on disk; it can be any part of a system that supports access through streams.
trans-unit.target: `path` 不需要是儲存在磁碟上的檔案它可以是系統支援透過資料流存取的任何部分。

trans-unit.source: For example, depending on the system, this class can access a physical device.
trans-unit.target: 例如，根據系統，此類別可以存取實體裝置。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A> is `true` for all <xref:System.IO.FileStream> objects that encapsulate files.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A> 是`true`所有<xref:System.IO.FileStream>封裝檔案的物件。

trans-unit.source: If `path` indicates a device that does not support seeking, the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanSeek%2A> property on the resulting <xref:System.IO.FileStream> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`path`指出不支援搜尋，裝置<xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanSeek%2A>上產生屬性<xref:System.IO.FileStream>是`false`。

trans-unit.source: For additional information, see <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A>。

trans-unit.source: `FileShare.Read` is the default for those <xref:System.IO.FileStream> constructors without a `FileShare` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `FileShare.Read` 這些是預設值<xref:System.IO.FileStream>建構函式不含`FileShare`參數。

trans-unit.source: For constructors without a <xref:System.IO.FileAccess> parameter, if the `mode` parameter is set to <xref:System.IO.FileMode.Append>, <xref:System.IO.FileAccess.Write> is the default access.
trans-unit.target: 建構函式不含<xref:System.IO.FileAccess>參數，如果`mode`參數設定為<xref:System.IO.FileMode.Append>，<xref:System.IO.FileAccess.Write>是預設存取權。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the access is set to <xref:System.IO.FileAccess.ReadWrite>.
trans-unit.target: 否則，將存取權設定為<xref:System.IO.FileAccess.ReadWrite>。

trans-unit.source: When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable, and could cause an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用特定文化特性設定進行編譯的一組字元，並擷取相同的字元具有不同的文化特性設定時，這些字元可能會無法解譯，，而且可能會造成擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common file and directory operations, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需常見的檔案和目錄作業的清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to write data to a file, byte by byte, and then verify that the data was written correctly.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何寫入資料到檔案時，位元組，並確認資料已正確寫入。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is an empty string (""), contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為空字串 ("")，只包含空格或包含一或多個無效字元。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="path" /> refers to a non-file device, such as "con:", "com1:", "lpt1:", etc. in an NTFS environment.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 是指非檔案裝置，例如 NTFS 環境中的 "con:"、"com1:"、"lpt1:" 等。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> refers to a non-file device, such as "con:", "com1:", "lpt1:", etc. in a non-NTFS environment.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 是指非檔案裝置，例如非 NTFS 環境中的 "con:"、"com1:"、"lpt1:" 等。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: The file cannot be found, such as when <paramref name="mode" /> is <see langword="FileMode.Truncate" /> or <see langword="FileMode.Open" />, and the file specified by <paramref name="path" /> does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 無法找到檔案，例如，當 <paramref name="mode" /> 為 <see langword="FileMode.Truncate" /> 或 <see langword="FileMode.Open" />，而且 <paramref name="path" /> 指定的檔案不存在的時候。

trans-unit.source: The file must already exist in these modes.
trans-unit.target: 這些模式中必須有此檔案。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error, such as specifying <see langword="FileMode.CreateNew" /> when the file specified by <paramref name="path" /> already exists, occurred.
trans-unit.target: 發生 I/O 錯誤，例如在 <paramref name="path" /> 指定的檔案已經存在時指定 <see langword="FileMode.CreateNew" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The stream has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 資料流已關閉。

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid, such as being on an unmapped drive.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑無效，例如位於未對應的磁碟機上。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 Windows 架構的平台上，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="mode" /> contains an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="mode" /> 包含無效的值。

trans-unit.source: for reading, writing, and appending to files.
trans-unit.target: 讀取、 寫入和附加至檔案。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />, and <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Append" />.
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />，和<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Append" />。

trans-unit.source: A file handle for the file that the current <see langword="FileStream" /> object will encapsulate.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see langword="FileStream" /> 物件將會封裝之檔案的檔案控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.FileAccess" /> constant that sets the <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanRead" /> and <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite" /> properties of the <see langword="FileStream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.FileAccess" /> 常數，它會設定 <see langword="FileStream" /> 物件的 <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanRead" /> 與 <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: A positive <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value greater than 0 indicating the buffer size.
trans-unit.target: 大於 0 的 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 正值，指出緩衝區大小。

trans-unit.source: The default buffer size is 4096.
trans-unit.target: 預設緩衝區大小為 4096。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> class for the specified file handle, with the specified read/write permission, and buffer size.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的讀取/寫入權限和緩衝區大小，初始化指定的檔案控制代碼之 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: `FileStream` assumes that it has exclusive control over the handle.
trans-unit.target: `FileStream` 假設它有控制代碼的專有控制權。

trans-unit.source: Reading, writing, or seeking while a `FileStream` is also holding a handle could result in data corruption.
trans-unit.target: 讀取、 寫入，或搜尋時`FileStream`也持有控制代碼可能會導致資料損毀。

trans-unit.source: For data safety, call <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Flush%2A> before using the handle, and avoid calling any methods other than `Close` after you are done using the handle.
trans-unit.target: 針對資料安全呼叫<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Flush%2A>之前使用此控制代碼，並避免呼叫任何方法以外`Close`完成之後使用此控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Alternately, read and write to the handle before calling this `FileStream` constructor.
trans-unit.target: 或者，讀取和寫入至控制代碼之前呼叫此`FileStream`建構函式。

trans-unit.source: `FileShare.Read` is the default for those <xref:System.IO.FileStream> constructors without a `FileShare` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `FileShare.Read` 這些是預設值<xref:System.IO.FileStream>建構函式不含`FileShare`參數。

trans-unit.source: When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable, and could cause an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用特定文化特性設定進行編譯的一組字元，並擷取相同的字元具有不同的文化特性設定時，這些字元可能會無法解譯，，而且可能會造成擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common file and directory operations, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需常見的檔案和目錄作業的清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="handle" /> parameter is an invalid handle.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="handle" /> 參數是無效的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="handle" /> parameter is a synchronous handle and it was used asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="handle" /> 參數是同步控制代碼，且已非同步使用。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="bufferSize" /> parameter is negative.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="bufferSize" /> 參數為負數。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error, such as a disk error, occurred.
trans-unit.target: 發生 I/O 錯誤，例如磁碟錯誤。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The stream has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 資料流已關閉。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="access" /> requested is not permitted by the operating system for the specified file handle, such as when <paramref name="access" /> is <see langword="Write" /> or <see langword="ReadWrite" /> and the file handle is set for read-only access.
trans-unit.target: 指定之檔案控制代碼的作業系統不允許所要求的 <paramref name="access" />，例如，當 <paramref name="access" /> 為 <see langword="Write" /> 或 <see langword="ReadWrite" />，而檔案控制代碼設定成唯讀存取時。

trans-unit.source: for reading, writing, and appending to files.
trans-unit.target: 讀取、 寫入和附加至檔案。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />, and <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Append" />.
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />，和<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Append" />。

trans-unit.source: for permission to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的權限。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: A file handle for the file that the current <see langword="FileStream" /> object will encapsulate.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see langword="FileStream" /> 物件將會封裝之檔案的檔案控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: A constant that sets the <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanRead" /> and <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite" /> properties of the <see langword="FileStream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 常數，設定 <see langword="FileStream" /> 物件的 <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanRead" /> 與 <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the file handle will be owned by this <see langword="FileStream" /> instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個 <see langword="FileStream" /> 執行個體將擁有檔案控制代碼，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> class for the specified file handle, with the specified read/write permission and <see langword="FileStream" /> instance ownership.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的讀取/寫入權限和 <see langword="FileStream" /> 執行個體擁有權，初始化指定檔案控制代碼之 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The `FileStream` object is given the specified access to the file.
trans-unit.target: `FileStream`物件會得到的指定的存取檔案。

trans-unit.source: The ownership of the handle will be as specified.
trans-unit.target: 控制代碼的擁有權會依指定。

trans-unit.source: If this process owns the handle, a call to the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A> method will also close the handle and the file's handle count is decremented.
trans-unit.target: 如果此程序擁有的控制代碼，呼叫<xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A>方法也會關閉此控制代碼，而檔案控制碼計數會遞減。

trans-unit.source: The `FileStream` object is given the default buffer size of 4096 bytes.
trans-unit.target: `FileStream`物件會得到預設緩衝區大小為 4096 位元組。

trans-unit.source: `FileStream` assumes that it has exclusive control over the handle.
trans-unit.target: `FileStream` 假設它有控制代碼的專有控制權。

trans-unit.source: Reading, writing, or seeking while a `FileStream` is also holding a handle could result in data corruption.
trans-unit.target: 讀取、 寫入，或搜尋時`FileStream`也持有控制代碼可能會導致資料損毀。

trans-unit.source: For data safety, call <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Flush%2A> before using the handle, and avoid calling methods other than `Close` after you are done using the handle.
trans-unit.target: 針對資料安全呼叫<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Flush%2A>之前使用此控制代碼，並避免呼叫的方法以外`Close`完成之後使用此控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: `FileShare.Read` is the default for those <xref:System.IO.FileStream> constructors without a `FileShare` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `FileShare.Read` 這些是預設值<xref:System.IO.FileStream>建構函式不含`FileShare`參數。

trans-unit.source: When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable, and could cause an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用特定文化特性設定進行編譯的一組字元，並擷取相同的字元具有不同的文化特性設定時，這些字元可能會無法解譯，，而且可能會造成擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common file and directory operations, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需常見的檔案和目錄作業的清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="access" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileAccess" /> 的欄位。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.target: 發生 I/O 錯誤，例如磁碟錯誤。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The stream has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 資料流已關閉。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="access" /> requested is not permitted by the operating system for the specified file handle, such as when <paramref name="access" /> is <see langword="Write" /> or <see langword="ReadWrite" /> and the file handle is set for read-only access.
trans-unit.target: 指定之檔案控制代碼的作業系統不允許所要求的 <paramref name="access" />，例如，當 <paramref name="access" /> 為 <see langword="Write" /> 或 <see langword="ReadWrite" />，而檔案控制代碼設定成唯讀存取時。

trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />，和<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Append" />。

trans-unit.source: A relative or absolute path for the file that the current <see langword="FileStream" /> object will encapsulate.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see langword="FileStream" /> 物件將會封裝之檔案的相對或絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: A constant that determines how to open or create the file.
trans-unit.target: 常數，決定如何開啟或建立檔案。

trans-unit.source: A constant that determines how the file can be accessed by the <see langword="FileStream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 常數，決定 <see langword="FileStream" /> 物件如何存取檔案。

trans-unit.source: This also determines the values returned by the <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanRead" /> and <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite" /> properties of the <see langword="FileStream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 這也可以判斷 <see langword="FileStream" /> 物件之 <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanRead" /> 與 <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite" /> 屬性傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanSeek" /> is <see langword="true" /> if <c>path</c> specifies a disk file.
trans-unit.target: 如果「路徑」<c></c>指定了磁碟檔案，則 <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanSeek" /> 為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> class with the specified path, creation mode, and read/write permission.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定路徑、建立模式和讀取/寫入權限，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework does not support direct access to physical disks through paths that are device names, such as "\\\\.\PHYSICALDRIVE0 ".
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 不支援直接存取實體磁碟，透過路徑的裝置名稱，例如"\\\\。 \PHYSICALDRIVE0"。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter can be a file name, including a file on a Universal Naming Convention (UNC) share.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數可以是檔案名稱，包括通用命名慣例 (UNC) 共用上的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The constructor is given read/write access to the file, and it is opened sharing Read access (that is, requests to open the file for writing by this or another process will fail until the `FileStream` object has been closed, but read attempts will succeed).
trans-unit.target: 建構函式可以讀取/寫入存取檔案，並開啟共用讀取權限 (亦即，若要開啟檔案以供寫入這個或另一個處理序將失敗，直到要求`FileStream`物件已關閉，但嘗試讀取則會成功)。

trans-unit.source: The buffer size is set to the default size of 4096 bytes (4 KB).
trans-unit.target: 緩衝區大小設定為 4096 個位元組 (4 KB) 的預設大小。

trans-unit.source: `path` is not required to be a file stored on disk; it can be any part of a system that supports access through streams.
trans-unit.target: `path` 不需要是儲存在磁碟上的檔案它可以是系統支援透過資料流存取的任何部分。

trans-unit.source: For example, depending on the system, this class can access a physical device.
trans-unit.target: 例如，根據系統，此類別可以存取實體裝置。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A> is `true` for all <xref:System.IO.FileStream> objects that encapsulate files.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A> 是`true`所有<xref:System.IO.FileStream>封裝檔案的物件。

trans-unit.source: If `path` indicates a device that does not support seeking, the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanSeek%2A> property on the resulting <xref:System.IO.FileStream> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`path`指出不支援搜尋，裝置<xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanSeek%2A>上產生屬性<xref:System.IO.FileStream>是`false`。

trans-unit.source: For additional information, see <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A>。

trans-unit.source: `FileShare.Read` is the default for those <xref:System.IO.FileStream> constructors without a `FileShare` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `FileShare.Read` 這些是預設值<xref:System.IO.FileStream>建構函式不含`FileShare`參數。

trans-unit.source: When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable, and could cause an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用特定文化特性設定進行編譯的一組字元，並擷取相同的字元具有不同的文化特性設定時，這些字元可能會無法解譯，，而且可能會造成擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common file and directory operations, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需常見的檔案和目錄作業的清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is an empty string (""), contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為空字串 ("")，只包含空格或包含一或多個無效字元。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="path" /> refers to a non-file device, such as "con:", "com1:", "lpt1:", etc. in an NTFS environment.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 是指非檔案裝置，例如 NTFS 環境中的 "con:"、"com1:"、"lpt1:" 等。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> refers to a non-file device, such as "con:", "com1:", "lpt1:", etc. in a non-NTFS environment.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 是指非檔案裝置，例如非 NTFS 環境中的 "con:"、"com1:"、"lpt1:" 等。

trans-unit.source: The file cannot be found, such as when <paramref name="mode" /> is <see langword="FileMode.Truncate" /> or <see langword="FileMode.Open" />, and the file specified by <paramref name="path" /> does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 無法找到檔案，例如，當 <paramref name="mode" /> 為 <see langword="FileMode.Truncate" /> 或 <see langword="FileMode.Open" />，而且 <paramref name="path" /> 指定的檔案不存在的時候。

trans-unit.source: The file must already exist in these modes.
trans-unit.target: 這些模式中必須有此檔案。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error, such as specifying <see langword="FileMode.CreateNew" /> when the file specified by <paramref name="path" /> already exists, occurred.
trans-unit.target: 發生 I/O 錯誤，例如在 <paramref name="path" /> 指定的檔案已經存在時指定 <see langword="FileMode.CreateNew" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The stream has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 資料流已關閉。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid, such as being on an unmapped drive.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑無效，例如位於未對應的磁碟機上。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="access" /> requested is not permitted by the operating system for the specified <paramref name="path" />, such as when <paramref name="access" /> is <see langword="Write" /> or <see langword="ReadWrite" /> and the file or directory is set for read-only access.
trans-unit.target: 指定之 <paramref name="access" /> 的作業系統不允許所要求的 <paramref name="path" />，例如，當 <paramref name="access" /> 為 <see langword="Write" /> 或 <see langword="ReadWrite" />，且檔案或目錄設定為唯讀存取時。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 Windows 架構的平台上，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="mode" /> contains an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="mode" /> 包含無效的值。

trans-unit.source: for reading, writing, and appending to files.
trans-unit.target: 讀取、 寫入和附加至檔案。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />, and <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Append" />.
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />，和<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Append" />。

trans-unit.source: A file handle for the file that this <see langword="FileStream" /> object will encapsulate.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see langword="FileStream" /> 物件將會封裝之檔案的檔案控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: A constant that sets the <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanRead" /> and <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite" /> properties of the <see langword="FileStream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 常數，設定 <see langword="FileStream" /> 物件的 <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanRead" /> 與 <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: A positive <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value greater than 0 indicating the buffer size.
trans-unit.target: 大於 0 的 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 正值，指出緩衝區大小。

trans-unit.source: The default buffer size is 4096.
trans-unit.target: 預設緩衝區大小為 4096。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the handle was opened asynchronously (that is, in overlapped I/O mode); otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制代碼為非同步開啟 (也就是，在重疊 I/O 模式)，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> class for the specified file handle, with the specified read/write permission, buffer size, and synchronous or asynchronous state.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的讀取/寫入權限、緩衝區大小和同步或非同步狀態，初始化指定的檔案控制代碼之 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: You set the `isAsync` parameter to `true` to open the file handle asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 您設定`isAsync`參數`true`以非同步方式開啟檔案控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: When the parameter is `true`, the stream utilizes overlapped I/O to perform file operations asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 當參數是`true`，資料流使用重疊的 I/O，以非同步方式執行檔案作業。

trans-unit.source: However, the parameter does not have to be `true` to call the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.ReadAsync%2A>, <xref:System.IO.FileStream.WriteAsync%2A>, or <xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 不過，有參數不是`true`呼叫<xref:System.IO.FileStream.ReadAsync%2A>， <xref:System.IO.FileStream.WriteAsync%2A>，或<xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When the `isAsync` parameter is `false` and you call the asynchronous read and write operations, the UI thread is still not blocked, but the actual I/O operation is performed synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 當`isAsync`參數是`false`和呼叫的非同步讀取和寫入作業，仍不封鎖 UI 執行緒，但實際的 I/O 作業會以同步方式執行。

trans-unit.source: `FileStream` assumes that it has exclusive control over the handle.
trans-unit.target: `FileStream` 假設它有控制代碼的專有控制權。

trans-unit.source: Reading, writing, or seeking while a `FileStream` is also holding a handle could result in data corruption.
trans-unit.target: 讀取、 寫入，或搜尋時`FileStream`也持有控制代碼可能會導致資料損毀。

trans-unit.source: For data safety, call <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Flush%2A> before using the handle, and avoid calling any methods other than `Close` after you are done using the handle.
trans-unit.target: 針對資料安全呼叫<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Flush%2A>之前使用此控制代碼，並避免呼叫任何方法以外`Close`完成之後使用此控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Alternately, read and write to the handle before calling this `FileStream` constructor.
trans-unit.target: 或者，讀取和寫入至控制代碼之前呼叫此`FileStream`建構函式。

trans-unit.source: `FileShare.Read` is the default for those <xref:System.IO.FileStream> constructors without a `FileShare` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `FileShare.Read` 這些是預設值<xref:System.IO.FileStream>建構函式不含`FileShare`參數。

trans-unit.source: When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable, and could cause an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用特定文化特性設定進行編譯的一組字元，並擷取相同的字元具有不同的文化特性設定時，這些字元可能會無法解譯，，而且可能會造成擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="handle" /> parameter is an invalid handle.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="handle" /> 參數是無效的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <paramref name="handle" /> parameter is a synchronous handle and it was used asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="handle" /> 參數是同步控制代碼，且已非同步使用。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="bufferSize" /> parameter is negative.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="bufferSize" /> 參數為負數。

trans-unit.target: 發生 I/O 錯誤，例如磁碟錯誤。

The stream has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 資料流已關閉。

trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.target: 指定之檔案控制代碼的作業系統不允許所要求的 <paramref name="access" />，例如，當 <paramref name="access" /> 為 <see langword="Write" /> 或 <see langword="ReadWrite" />，而檔案控制代碼設定成唯讀存取時。

trans-unit.target: 讀取、 寫入和附加至檔案。

trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />，和<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Append" />。

trans-unit.source: for permission to call unmanaged code.

trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: A file handle for the file that this <see langword="FileStream" /> object will encapsulate.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see langword="FileStream" /> 物件將會封裝之檔案的檔案控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: A constant that sets the <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanRead" /> and <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite" /> properties of the <see langword="FileStream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 常數，設定 <see langword="FileStream" /> 物件的 <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanRead" /> 與 <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the file handle will be owned by this <see langword="FileStream" /> instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A positive <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value greater than 0 indicating the buffer size.
trans-unit.target: 大於 0 的 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 正值，指出緩衝區大小。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> class for the specified file handle, with the specified read/write permission, <see langword="FileStream" /> instance ownership, and buffer size.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的讀取/寫入權限、<see langword="FileStream" /> 執行個體擁有權和緩衝區大小，初始化指定檔案控制代碼之 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The `FileStream` object is given the specified access to the file.
trans-unit.target: `FileStream`物件會得到的指定的存取檔案。

trans-unit.source: The ownership of the handle will be as specified.
trans-unit.target: 控制代碼的擁有權會依指定。

trans-unit.source: If this `FileStream` owns the handle, a call to the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A> method will also close the handle.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個`FileStream`擁有的控制代碼呼叫<xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A>方法也會關閉此控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: In particular, the file's handle count is decremented.
trans-unit.target: 特別是，檔案的控制碼計數會遞減。

trans-unit.source: The `FileStream` object is given the specified buffer size.
trans-unit.target: `FileStream`物件會得到在指定的緩衝區大小。

trans-unit.source: `FileStream` assumes that it has exclusive control over the handle.
trans-unit.target: `FileStream` 假設它有控制代碼的專有控制權。

trans-unit.source: Reading, writing, or seeking while a `FileStream` is also holding a handle could result in data corruption.
trans-unit.target: 讀取、 寫入，或搜尋時`FileStream`也持有控制代碼可能會導致資料損毀。

trans-unit.source: For data safety, call <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Flush%2A> before using the handle, and avoid calling any methods other than `Close` after you are done using the handle.
trans-unit.target: 針對資料安全呼叫<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Flush%2A>之前使用此控制代碼，並避免呼叫任何方法以外`Close`完成之後使用此控制代碼。

The stream has been closed.

trans-unit.source: A relative or absolute path for the file that the current <see langword="FileStream" /> object will encapsulate.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see langword="FileStream" /> 物件將會封裝之檔案的相對或絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: A constant that determines how to open or create the file.
trans-unit.target: 常數，決定如何開啟或建立檔案。

trans-unit.source: A constant that determines how the file can be accessed by the <see langword="FileStream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 常數，決定 <see langword="FileStream" /> 物件如何存取檔案。

trans-unit.source: This also determines the values returned by the <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanRead" /> and <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite" /> properties of the <see langword="FileStream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 這也可以判斷 <see langword="FileStream" /> 物件之 <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanRead" /> 與 <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite" /> 屬性傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanSeek" /> is <see langword="true" /> if <c>path</c> specifies a disk file.
trans-unit.target: 如果「路徑」<c></c>指定了磁碟檔案，則 <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanSeek" /> 為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.target: 常數，決定處理程序如何共用檔案。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> class with the specified path, creation mode, read/write permission, and sharing permission.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework does not support direct access to physical disks through paths that are device names, such as "\\\\.\PHYSICALDRIVE0 ".
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 不支援直接存取實體磁碟，透過路徑的裝置名稱，例如"\\\\。 \PHYSICALDRIVE0"。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter can be a file name, including a file on a Universal Naming Convention (UNC) share.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數可以是檔案名稱，包括通用命名慣例 (UNC) 共用上的檔案。

trans-unit.source: The constructor is given read/write access to the file, and it is opened sharing Read access (that is, requests to open the file for writing by this or another process will fail until the `FileStream` object has been closed, but read attempts will succeed).
trans-unit.target: 建構函式可以讀取/寫入存取檔案，並開啟共用讀取權限 (亦即，若要開啟檔案以供寫入這個或另一個處理序將失敗，直到要求`FileStream`物件已關閉，但嘗試讀取則會成功)。

trans-unit.source: The buffer size is set to the default size of 4096 bytes (4 KB).
trans-unit.target: 緩衝區大小設定為 4096 個位元組 (4 KB) 的預設大小。

trans-unit.source: `path` is not required to be a file stored on disk; it can be any part of a system that supports access through streams.
trans-unit.target: `path` 不需要是儲存在磁碟上的檔案它可以是系統支援透過資料流存取的任何部分。

trans-unit.source: For example, depending on the system, this class can access a physical device.
trans-unit.target: 例如，根據系統，此類別可以存取實體裝置。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A> is `true` for all <xref:System.IO.FileStream> objects that encapsulate files.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A> 是`true`所有<xref:System.IO.FileStream>封裝檔案的物件。

trans-unit.source: If `path` indicates a device that does not support seeking, the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanSeek%2A> property on the resulting <xref:System.IO.FileStream> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`path`指出不支援搜尋，裝置<xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanSeek%2A>上產生屬性<xref:System.IO.FileStream>是`false`。

trans-unit.source: For additional information, see <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable, and could cause an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用特定文化特性設定進行編譯的一組字元，並擷取相同的字元具有不同的文化特性設定時，這些字元可能會無法解譯，，而且可能會造成擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common file and directory operations, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需常見的檔案和目錄作業的清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Lock%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Lock%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is an empty string (""), contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為空字串 ("")，只包含空格或包含一或多個無效字元。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="path" /> refers to a non-file device, such as "con:", "com1:", "lpt1:", etc. in an NTFS environment.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 是指非檔案裝置，例如 NTFS 環境中的 "con:"、"com1:"、"lpt1:" 等。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> refers to a non-file device, such as "con:", "com1:", "lpt1:", etc. in a non-NTFS environment.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 是指非檔案裝置，例如非 NTFS 環境中的 "con:"、"com1:"、"lpt1:" 等。

trans-unit.source: The file cannot be found, such as when <paramref name="mode" /> is <see langword="FileMode.Truncate" /> or <see langword="FileMode.Open" />, and the file specified by <paramref name="path" /> does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 無法找到檔案，例如，當 <paramref name="mode" /> 為 <see langword="FileMode.Truncate" /> 或 <see langword="FileMode.Open" />，而且 <paramref name="path" /> 指定的檔案不存在的時候。

trans-unit.source: The file must already exist in these modes.
trans-unit.target: 這些模式中必須有此檔案。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error, such as specifying <see langword="FileMode.CreateNew" /> when the file specified by <paramref name="path" /> already exists, occurred.
trans-unit.target: 發生 I/O 錯誤，例如在 <paramref name="path" /> 指定的檔案已經存在時指定 <see langword="FileMode.CreateNew" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The system is running Windows 98 or Windows 98 Second Edition and <paramref name="share" /> is set to <see langword="FileShare.Delete" />.
trans-unit.target: 系統在執行 Windows 98 或 Windows 98 SE，且 <paramref name="share" /> 設定為 <see langword="FileShare.Delete" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The stream has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 資料流已關閉。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid, such as being on an unmapped drive.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑無效，例如位於未對應的磁碟機上。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="access" /> requested is not permitted by the operating system for the specified <paramref name="path" />, such as when <paramref name="access" /> is <see langword="Write" /> or <see langword="ReadWrite" /> and the file or directory is set for read-only access.
trans-unit.target: 指定之 <paramref name="access" /> 的作業系統不允許所要求的 <paramref name="path" />，例如，當 <paramref name="access" /> 為 <see langword="Write" /> 或 <see langword="ReadWrite" />，且檔案或目錄設定為唯讀存取時。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 Windows 架構的平台上，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="mode" /> contains an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="mode" /> 包含無效的值。

trans-unit.source: for reading, writing, and appending to files.
trans-unit.target: 讀取、 寫入和附加至檔案。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />, and <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Append" />.
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />，和<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Append" />。

trans-unit.source: A file handle for the file that this <see langword="FileStream" /> object will encapsulate.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see langword="FileStream" /> 物件將會封裝之檔案的檔案控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: A constant that sets the <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanRead" /> and <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite" /> properties of the <see langword="FileStream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 常數，設定 <see langword="FileStream" /> 物件的 <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanRead" /> 與 <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the file handle will be owned by this <see langword="FileStream" /> instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個 <see langword="FileStream" /> 執行個體將擁有檔案控制代碼，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A positive <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value greater than 0 indicating the buffer size.
trans-unit.target: 大於 0 的 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 正值，指出緩衝區大小。

trans-unit.source: The default buffer size is 4096.
trans-unit.target: 預設緩衝區大小為 4096。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the handle was opened asynchronously (that is, in overlapped I/O mode); otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制代碼為非同步開啟 (也就是，在重疊 I/O 模式)，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> class for the specified file handle, with the specified read/write permission, <see langword="FileStream" /> instance ownership, buffer size, and synchronous or asynchronous state.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的讀取/寫入權限、<see langword="FileStream" /> 執行個體擁有權、緩衝區大小和同步或非同步狀態，初始化指定檔案控制代碼之 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The `FileStream` object is given the specified access to the file.
trans-unit.target: `FileStream`物件會得到的指定的存取檔案。

trans-unit.source: The ownership of the handle will be as specified.
trans-unit.target: 控制代碼的擁有權會依指定。

trans-unit.source: If this `FileStream` owns the handle, a call to the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A> method will also close the handle.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個`FileStream`擁有的控制代碼呼叫<xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A>方法也會關閉此控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: In particular, the file's handle count is decremented.
trans-unit.target: 特別是，檔案的控制碼計數會遞減。

trans-unit.source: The `FileStream` object is given the specified buffer size.
trans-unit.target: `FileStream`物件會得到在指定的緩衝區大小。

trans-unit.source: `FileStream` assumes that it has exclusive control over the handle.
trans-unit.target: `FileStream` 假設它有控制代碼的專有控制權。

trans-unit.source: Reading, writing, or seeking while a `FileStream` is also holding a handle could result in data corruption.
trans-unit.target: 讀取、 寫入，或搜尋時`FileStream`也持有控制代碼可能會導致資料損毀。

trans-unit.source: For data safety, call <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Flush%2A> before using the handle, and avoid calling any methods other than `Close` after you are done using the handle.
trans-unit.target: 針對資料安全呼叫<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Flush%2A>之前使用此控制代碼，並避免呼叫任何方法以外`Close`完成之後使用此控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Alternately, read and write to the handle before calling this `FileStream` constructor.
trans-unit.target: 或者，讀取和寫入至控制代碼之前呼叫此`FileStream`建構函式。

trans-unit.source: `FileShare.Read` is the default for those <xref:System.IO.FileStream> constructors without a `FileShare` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `FileShare.Read` 這些是預設值<xref:System.IO.FileStream>建構函式不含`FileShare`參數。

trans-unit.source: When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable, and could cause an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用特定文化特性設定進行編譯的一組字元，並擷取相同的字元具有不同的文化特性設定時，這些字元可能會無法解譯，，而且可能會造成擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="access" /> is less than <see langword="FileAccess.Read" /> or greater than <see langword="FileAccess.ReadWrite" /> or <paramref name="bufferSize" /> is less than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="access" /> 小於 <see langword="FileAccess.Read" /> 或大於 <see langword="FileAccess.ReadWrite" /> 或者 <paramref name="bufferSize" /> 小於或等於 0。

trans-unit.source: The handle is invalid.
trans-unit.target: 控制代碼無效。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error, such as a disk error, occurred.
trans-unit.target: 發生 I/O 錯誤，例如磁碟錯誤。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The stream has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 資料流已關閉。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="access" /> requested is not permitted by the operating system for the specified file handle, such as when <paramref name="access" /> is <see langword="Write" /> or <see langword="ReadWrite" /> and the file handle is set for read-only access.
trans-unit.target: 指定之檔案控制代碼的作業系統不允許所要求的 <paramref name="access" />，例如，當 <paramref name="access" /> 為 <see langword="Write" /> 或 <see langword="ReadWrite" />，而檔案控制代碼設定成唯讀存取時。

trans-unit.source: for access to unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用於存取 unmanaged 程式碼。

trans-unit.target: 關聯的列舉型別：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />。

trans-unit.source: A relative or absolute path for the file that the current <see langword="FileStream" /> object will encapsulate.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see langword="FileStream" /> 物件將會封裝之檔案的相對或絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: A constant that determines how to open or create the file.
trans-unit.target: 常數，決定如何開啟或建立檔案。

trans-unit.source: A constant that determines how the file can be accessed by the <see langword="FileStream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 常數，決定 <see langword="FileStream" /> 物件如何存取檔案。

trans-unit.source: This also determines the values returned by the <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanRead" /> and <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite" /> properties of the <see langword="FileStream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 這也可以判斷 <see langword="FileStream" /> 物件之 <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanRead" /> 與 <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite" /> 屬性傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanSeek" /> is <see langword="true" /> if <c>path</c> specifies a disk file.
trans-unit.target: 如果「路徑」<c></c>指定了磁碟檔案，則 <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanSeek" /> 為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: A constant that determines how the file will be shared by processes.
trans-unit.target: 常數，決定處理程序如何共用檔案。

trans-unit.source: A positive <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value greater than 0 indicating the buffer size.
trans-unit.target: 大於 0 的 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 正值，指出緩衝區大小。

trans-unit.source: The default buffer size is 4096.
trans-unit.target: 預設緩衝區大小為 4096。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> class with the specified path, creation mode, read/write and sharing permission, and buffer size.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定路徑、建立模式、讀取/寫入與共用權限與緩衝區大小，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 不支援直接存取實體磁碟，透過路徑的裝置名稱，例如"\\\\。 \PHYSICALDRIVE0"。

trans-unit.source: for reading, writing, and appending to files.
trans-unit.target: 讀取、 寫入和附加至檔案。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />, <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />, and <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Append" />.
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />，和<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Append" />。

trans-unit.source: A relative or absolute path for the file that the current <see langword="FileStream" /> object will encapsulate.
trans-unit.target: 目前 <see langword="FileStream" /> 物件將會封裝之檔案的相對或絕對路徑。

trans-unit.source: A constant that determines how to open or create the file.
trans-unit.target: 常數，決定如何開啟或建立檔案。

trans-unit.source: A constant that determines how the file can be accessed by the <see langword="FileStream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 常數，決定 <see langword="FileStream" /> 物件如何存取檔案。

trans-unit.source: This also determines the values returned by the <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanRead" /> and <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite" /> properties of the <see langword="FileStream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 這也可以判斷 <see langword="FileStream" /> 物件之 <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanRead" /> 與 <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite" /> 屬性傳回的值。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanSeek" /> is <see langword="true" /> if <c>path</c> specifies a disk file.
trans-unit.target: 如果「路徑」<c></c>指定了磁碟檔案，則 <see cref="P:System.IO.FileStream.CanSeek" /> 為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: A constant that determines how the file will be shared by processes.
trans-unit.target: 常數，決定處理程序如何共用檔案。

trans-unit.source: A positive <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value greater than 0 indicating the buffer size.
trans-unit.target: 大於 0 的 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 正值，指出緩衝區大小。

trans-unit.source: The default buffer size is 4096..
trans-unit.target: 預設緩衝區大小為 4096。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to use asynchronous I/O or synchronous I/O.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用非同步 I/O 或同步 I/O。

trans-unit.source: However, note that the underlying operating system might not support asynchronous I/O, so when specifying <see langword="true" />, the handle might be opened synchronously depending on the platform.
trans-unit.target: 但是，請注意：基礎作業系統可能並不支援非同步 I/O，所以在指定 <see langword="true" /> 時，可能會視平台以同步方式開啟控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: When opened asynchronously, the <see cref="M:System.IO.FileStream.BeginRead(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> and <see cref="M:System.IO.FileStream.BeginWrite(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> methods perform better on large reads or writes, but they might be much slower for small reads or writes.
trans-unit.target: 在以非同步方式開啟時，<see cref="M:System.IO.FileStream.BeginRead(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 與 <see cref="M:System.IO.FileStream.BeginWrite(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 方法對大量讀取或寫入的作業會有較佳的效能，但對於少量讀取和寫入的作業卻會比較慢。

trans-unit.source: If the application is designed to take advantage of asynchronous I/O, set the <c>useAsync</c> parameter to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要將應用程式設計成使用非同步 I/O，請將 <c>useAsync</c> 參數設定為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Using asynchronous I/O correctly can speed up applications by as much as a factor of 10, but using it without redesigning the application for asynchronous I/O can decrease performance by as much as a factor of 10.
trans-unit.target: 正確地使用非同步 I/O，可以讓應用程式的執行快上十倍，但如果沒有配合非同步 I/O 的需求重新設計應用程式，卻會降低十倍的效能。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> class with the specified path, creation mode, read/write and sharing permission, buffer size, and synchronous or asynchronous state.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定路徑、建立模式、讀取/寫入與共用權限、緩衝大小與同步或非同步狀態，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework does not support direct access to physical disks through paths that are device names, such as "\\\\.\PHYSICALDRIVE0 ".
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 不支援直接存取實體磁碟，透過路徑的裝置名稱，例如"\\\\。 \PHYSICALDRIVE0"。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter can be a file name, including a file on a Universal Naming Convention (UNC) share.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數可以是檔案名稱，包括通用命名慣例 (UNC) 共用上的檔案。

trans-unit.source: `path` is not required to be a file stored on disk; it can be any part of a system that supports access through streams.
trans-unit.target: `path` 不需要是儲存在磁碟上的檔案它可以是系統支援透過資料流存取的任何部分。

trans-unit.source: For example, depending on the system, this class can access a physical device.
trans-unit.target: 例如，根據系統，此類別可以存取實體裝置。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A> is `true` for all <xref:System.IO.FileStream> objects that encapsulate files.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A> 是`true`所有<xref:System.IO.FileStream>封裝檔案的物件。

trans-unit.source: If `path` indicates a device that does not support seeking, the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanSeek%2A> property on the resulting <xref:System.IO.FileStream> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`path`指出不支援搜尋，裝置<xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanSeek%2A>上產生屬性<xref:System.IO.FileStream>是`false`。

trans-unit.source: For additional information, see <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable, and could cause an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用特定文化特性設定進行編譯的一組字元，並擷取相同的字元具有不同的文化特性設定時，這些字元可能會無法解譯，，而且可能會造成擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common file and directory operations, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需常見的檔案和目錄作業的清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to asynchronously write data to a file and then verify that the data was written correctly.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以非同步方式將資料寫入檔案，然後確認 資料已正確地寫入。

trans-unit.source: A `State` object is created to pass information from the main thread to the `EndReadCallback` and `EndWriteCallback` methods.
trans-unit.target: A`State`物件是用來將資訊從主執行緒`EndReadCallback`和`EndWriteCallback`方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is an empty string (""), contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 為空字串 ("")，只包含空格或包含一或多個無效字元。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="path" /> refers to a non-file device, such as "con:", "com1:", "lpt1:", etc. in an NTFS environment.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 是指非檔案裝置，例如 NTFS 環境中的 "con:"、"com1:"、"lpt1:" 等。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> refers to a non-file device, such as "con:", "com1:", "lpt1:", etc. in a non-NTFS environment.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> 是指非檔案裝置，例如非 NTFS 環境中的 "con:"、"com1:"、"lpt1:" 等。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="bufferSize" /> is negative or zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="bufferSize" /> 為負值或零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="mode" />, <paramref name="access" />, or <paramref name="share" /> contain an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="mode" />、<paramref name="access" /> 或 <paramref name="share" /> 包含無效值。

trans-unit.source: The file cannot be found, such as when <paramref name="mode" /> is <see langword="FileMode.Truncate" /> or <see langword="FileMode.Open" />, and the file specified by <paramref name="path" /> does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 無法找到檔案，例如，當 <paramref name="mode" /> 為 <see langword="FileMode.Truncate" /> 或 <see langword="FileMode.Open" />，而且 <paramref name="path" /> 指定的檔案不存在的時候。

trans-unit.source: The file must already exist in these modes.
trans-unit.target: 這些模式中必須有此檔案。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error, such as specifying <see langword="FileMode.CreateNew" /> when the file specified by <paramref name="path" /> already exists, occurred.
trans-unit.target: 發生 I/O 錯誤，例如在 <paramref name="path" /> 指定的檔案已經存在時指定 <see langword="FileMode.CreateNew" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The system is running Windows 98 or Windows 98 Second Edition and <paramref name="share" /> is set to <see langword="FileShare.Delete" />.
trans-unit.target: 系統在執行 Windows 98 或 Windows 98 SE，且 <paramref name="share" /> 設定為 <see langword="FileShare.Delete" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The stream has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 資料流已關閉。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: The specified path is invalid, such as being on an unmapped drive.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑無效，例如位於未對應的磁碟機上。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="access" /> requested is not permitted by the operating system for the specified <paramref name="path" />, such as when <paramref name="access" /> is <see langword="Write" /> or <see langword="ReadWrite" /> and the file or directory is set for read-only access.
trans-unit.target: 指定之 <paramref name="access" /> 的作業系統不允許所要求的 <paramref name="path" />，例如，當 <paramref name="access" /> 為 <see langword="Write" /> 或 <see langword="ReadWrite" />，且檔案或目錄設定為唯讀存取時。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must be less than 248 characters, and file names must be less than 260 characters.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在 Windows 架構的平台上，路徑必須少於 248 個字元，檔案名稱必須少於 260 個字元。

trans-unit.source: A constant that determines how the file will be shared by processes.

trans-unit.source: A constant that specifies additional file options.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> class with the specified path, creation mode, access rights and sharing permission, the buffer size, and additional file options.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的路徑、建立模式、存取權與共用權限、緩衝區大小和其他檔案選項，初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework does not support direct access to physical disks through paths that are device names, such as "\\\\.\PHYSICALDRIVE0 ".
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 不支援直接存取實體磁碟，透過路徑的裝置名稱，例如"\\\\。 \PHYSICALDRIVE0"。

trans-unit.source: Use this <xref:System.IO.FileStream.%23ctor%2A> constructor to apply access rights at the point of creation of a file.
trans-unit.target: 使用此<xref:System.IO.FileStream.%23ctor%2A>建構函式來將存取權套用權限時建立檔案的檔案。

trans-unit.source: To access or modify rights on an existing file, consider using the <xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A> and <xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取或修改現有的檔案上的權限，請考慮使用<xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A>和<xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The `fileOptions` parameter is used to provide access to more advanced operations that can be leveraged when creating a <xref:System.IO.FileStream> object.
trans-unit.target: `fileOptions`參數用來提供更進階的作業，可以在建立時運用的存取權<xref:System.IO.FileStream>物件。

trans-unit.source: The `path` parameter can be a file name, including a file on a Universal Naming Convention (UNC) share.
trans-unit.target: `path`參數可以是檔案名稱，包括通用命名慣例 (UNC) 共用上的檔案。

trans-unit.source: `path` is not required to be a file stored on disk; it can be any part of a system that supports access through streams.
trans-unit.target: `path` 不需要是儲存在磁碟上的檔案它可以是系統支援透過資料流存取的任何部分。

trans-unit.source: For example, depending on the system, this class can access a physical device.
trans-unit.target: 例如，根據系統，此類別可以存取實體裝置。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A> is `true` for all <xref:System.IO.FileStream> objects that encapsulate files.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A> 是`true`所有<xref:System.IO.FileStream>封裝檔案的物件。

trans-unit.source: If `path` indicates a device that does not support seeking, the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanSeek%2A> property on the resulting <xref:System.IO.FileStream> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`path`指出不支援搜尋，裝置<xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanSeek%2A>上產生屬性<xref:System.IO.FileStream>是`false`。

trans-unit.source: For additional information, see <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When you compile a set of characters with a particular cultural setting and retrieve those same characters with a different cultural setting, the characters might not be interpretable, and could cause an exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用特定文化特性設定進行編譯的一組字元，並擷取相同的字元具有不同的文化特性設定時，這些字元可能會無法解譯，，而且可能會造成擲回例外狀況。
