trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Read" />， <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Write" />，和<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.Append" />。

trans-unit.source: The buffer to read data into.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取資料的緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The byte offset in <c>array</c> at which to begin reading.
trans-unit.target: 「陣列」<c></c>中的位元組位移，即開始讀取的位置。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取的最大位元組數。

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the asynchronous read operation is completed.
trans-unit.target: 在非同步讀取作業完成時所呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous read request from other requests.
trans-unit.target: 使用者所提供的物件，其可以從其他要求中區分出這個特定非同步讀取的要求。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous read operation.
trans-unit.target: 開始非同步的讀取作業。

trans-unit.source: (Consider using <see cref="M:System.IO.FileStream.ReadAsync(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)" /> instead.)
trans-unit.target: (請考慮用 <see cref="M:System.IO.FileStream.ReadAsync(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)" /> 替代。)

trans-unit.source: An object that references the asynchronous read.
trans-unit.target: 物件，參考非同步讀取。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions, you have to use methods such as <xref:System.IO.FileStream.BeginRead%2A> and <xref:System.IO.FileStream.EndRead%2A> to implement asynchronous file operations.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 4 和舊版中，您必須使用下列方法<xref:System.IO.FileStream.BeginRead%2A>和<xref:System.IO.FileStream.EndRead%2A>實作非同步檔案作業。

trans-unit.source: These methods are still available in the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] to support legacy code; however, the new async methods, such as <xref:System.IO.FileStream.ReadAsync%2A>, <xref:System.IO.FileStream.WriteAsync%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.FileStream.FlushAsync%2A>, help you implement asynchronous file operations more easily.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法都仍有[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]以支援舊版的程式碼; 不過，新的非同步方法，例如<xref:System.IO.FileStream.ReadAsync%2A>， <xref:System.IO.FileStream.WriteAsync%2A>， <xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%2A>，和<xref:System.IO.FileStream.FlushAsync%2A>，協助您更輕鬆地實作非同步檔案作業。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.FileStream.EndRead%2A> must be called exactly once for every call to <xref:System.IO.FileStream.BeginRead%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileStream.EndRead%2A> 必須針對每次呼叫一次呼叫<xref:System.IO.FileStream.BeginRead%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Failing to end a read process before beginning another read can cause undesirable behavior such as deadlock.
trans-unit.target: 若要開始另一次讀取之前結束讀取的處理序失敗，可能會導致非預期的行為，例如死結。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.FileStream> provides two different modes of operation: synchronous I/O and asynchronous I/O.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileStream> 提供兩個不同的作業模式： I/O 同步和非同步 I/O。

trans-unit.source: While either can be used, the underlying operating system resources might allow access in only one of these modes.
trans-unit.target: 雖然可以用來，基礎作業系統資源可能只有其中一個這些模式中允許存取。

trans-unit.source: By default, <xref:System.IO.FileStream> opens the operating system handle synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.IO.FileStream>以同步方式開啟的作業系統控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: In Windows, this slows down asynchronous methods.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 中，這會略微減慢非同步方法。

trans-unit.source: If asynchronous methods are used, use the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.IO.FileMode%2CSystem.IO.FileAccess%2CSystem.IO.FileShare%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用非同步方法，使用<xref:System.IO.FileStream.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.IO.FileMode%2CSystem.IO.FileAccess%2CSystem.IO.FileShare%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%29>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanRead%2A> property to determine whether the current instance supports reading.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanRead%2A>屬性來判斷目前的執行個體是否支援讀取。

trans-unit.source: For additional information, see <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanRead%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanRead%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If a stream is closed or you pass an invalid argument, exceptions are thrown immediately from <xref:System.IO.FileStream.BeginRead%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料流已關閉，或是您傳遞了無效的引數，會擲回例外狀況立即從<xref:System.IO.FileStream.BeginRead%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Errors that occur during an asynchronous read request, such as a disk failure during the IO request, occur on the thread pool thread and become visible upon a call to <xref:System.IO.FileStream.EndRead%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 非同步讀取要求，例如磁碟失敗期間的 IO 要求期間發生的錯誤發生在執行緒集區執行緒，並且呼叫時變成可見<xref:System.IO.FileStream.EndRead%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndRead%2A> must be called with this <xref:System.IAsyncResult> to find out how many bytes were read.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndRead%2A> 必須先呼叫與這個<xref:System.IAsyncResult>找出多少位元組被讀取。

trans-unit.source: Multiple simultaneous asynchronous requests render the request completion order uncertain.
trans-unit.target: 多個同時進行非同步要求轉譯要求完成順序不確定。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common file and directory operations, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需常見的檔案和目錄作業的清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.IO.FileMode%2CSystem.IO.FileAccess%2CSystem.IO.FileShare%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.IO.FileStream.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.IO.FileMode%2CSystem.IO.FileAccess%2CSystem.IO.FileShare%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%29>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The array length minus <paramref name="offset" /> is less than <paramref name="numBytes" />.
trans-unit.target: 陣列長度減去 <paramref name="offset" /> 會小於 <paramref name="numBytes" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> or <paramref name="numBytes" /> is negative.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 或 <paramref name="numBytes" /> 是負數。

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous read was attempted past the end of the file.
trans-unit.target: 在超過檔案結尾處嘗試了非同步讀取。

trans-unit.source: The buffer containing data to write to the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 包含要寫入目前資料流之資料的緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based byte offset in <c>array</c> at which to begin copying bytes to the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 「陣列」<c></c>中以零為起始的位元組位移，即要開始將位元組複製到目前資料流的位置。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to write.
trans-unit.target: 寫入的最大位元組數。

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the asynchronous write operation is completed.
trans-unit.target: 在非同步寫入作業完成時所呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: A user-provided object that distinguishes this particular asynchronous write request from other requests.
trans-unit.target: 使用者所提供的物件，其可以從其他要求中區分出這個特定非同步寫入的要求。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous write operation.
trans-unit.target: 開始非同步的寫入作業。

trans-unit.source: (Consider using <see cref="M:System.IO.FileStream.WriteAsync(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)" /> instead.)
trans-unit.target: (請考慮用 <see cref="M:System.IO.FileStream.WriteAsync(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)" /> 替代。)

trans-unit.source: An object that references the asynchronous write.
trans-unit.target: 物件，參考非同步寫入。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions, you have to use methods such as <xref:System.IO.FileStream.BeginWrite%2A> and <xref:System.IO.FileStream.EndWrite%2A> to implement asynchronous file operations.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 4 和舊版中，您必須使用下列方法<xref:System.IO.FileStream.BeginWrite%2A>和<xref:System.IO.FileStream.EndWrite%2A>實作非同步檔案作業。

trans-unit.source: These methods are still available in the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] to support legacy code; however, the new async methods, such as <xref:System.IO.FileStream.ReadAsync%2A>, <xref:System.IO.FileStream.WriteAsync%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.FileStream.FlushAsync%2A>, help you implement asynchronous file operations more easily.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法都仍有[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]以支援舊版的程式碼; 不過，新的非同步方法，例如<xref:System.IO.FileStream.ReadAsync%2A>， <xref:System.IO.FileStream.WriteAsync%2A>， <xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%2A>，和<xref:System.IO.FileStream.FlushAsync%2A>，協助您更輕鬆地實作非同步檔案作業。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.FileStream.EndWrite%2A> must be called exactly once on every <xref:System.IAsyncResult> from <xref:System.IO.FileStream.BeginWrite%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileStream.EndWrite%2A> 必須正好一次上呼叫每個<xref:System.IAsyncResult>從<xref:System.IO.FileStream.BeginWrite%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.FileStream.EndWrite%2A> will block until the I/O operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileStream.EndWrite%2A> 將會封鎖，直到 I/O 作業完成為止。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法覆寫 <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.FileStream> provides two different modes of operation: synchronous I/O and asynchronous I/O.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.IO.FileMode%2CSystem.IO.FileAccess%2CSystem.IO.FileShare%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.IO.FileStream.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.IO.FileMode%2CSystem.IO.FileAccess%2CSystem.IO.FileShare%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%29>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> length minus <paramref name="offset" /> is less than <paramref name="numBytes" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 長度減 <paramref name="offset" /> 小於 <paramref name="numBytes" />。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 或 <paramref name="numBytes" /> 為負。

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support writing.
trans-unit.target: 資料流不支援寫入。

trans-unit.source: The stream is closed.
trans-unit.target: 資料流已關閉。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports reading.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示目前資料流是否支援讀取的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the stream supports reading; <see langword="false" /> if the stream is closed or was opened with write-only access.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料流支援讀取，則為 <see langword="true" />；如果資料流已關閉或以唯寫存取開啟，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If a class derived from <xref:System.IO.Stream> does not support reading, calls to the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.FileStream.ReadByte%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.FileStream.BeginRead%2A> methods throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果類別衍生自<xref:System.IO.Stream>不支援讀取，但呼叫<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Read%2A>， <xref:System.IO.FileStream.ReadByte%2A>，和<xref:System.IO.FileStream.BeginRead%2A>方法會擲回<xref:System.NotSupportedException>。

trans-unit.source: If the stream is closed, this property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料流已關閉，則這個屬性會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates a use of the `CanRead` property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範使用`CanRead`屬性。

trans-unit.source: The output of this code is "MyFile.txt is not writable."
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼的輸出是"MyFile.txt 沒有可寫入 」。

trans-unit.source: To get the output message "MyFile.txt can be both written to and read from.", change the `FileAccess` parameter to `ReadWrite` in the `FileStream` constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得輸出訊息"MyFile.txt 可被寫入和讀取。 」，變更`FileAccess`參數`ReadWrite`中`FileStream`建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports seeking.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示目前資料流是否支援搜尋的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the stream supports seeking; <see langword="false" /> if the stream is closed or if the <see langword="FileStream" /> was constructed from an operating-system handle such as a pipe or output to the console.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料流支援搜尋，則為 <see langword="true" />；如果資料流已關閉或如果 <see langword="FileStream" /> 是從作業系統控制代碼 (例如管道或主控台的輸出) 建構，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If a class derived from <xref:System.IO.Stream> does not support seeking, calls to <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Length%2A>, <xref:System.IO.FileStream.SetLength%2A>, <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Position%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Seek%2A> throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果類別衍生自<xref:System.IO.Stream>不支援搜尋，但呼叫<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Length%2A>， <xref:System.IO.FileStream.SetLength%2A>， <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Position%2A>，和<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Seek%2A>擲回<xref:System.NotSupportedException>。

trans-unit.source: If the stream is closed, this property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料流已關閉，則這個屬性會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the `CanSeek` property to check whether a stream supports seeking.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用`CanSeek`回資料流是否支援搜尋的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports writing.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示目前資料流是否支援寫入的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the stream supports writing; <see langword="false" /> if the stream is closed or was opened with read-only access.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料流支援寫入，則為 <see langword="true" />；如果資料流已關閉或以唯讀存取開啟，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If a class derived from <xref:System.IO.Stream> does not support writing, a call to <xref:System.IO.FileStream.SetLength%2A>, <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Write%2A>, <xref:System.IO.FileStream.BeginWrite%2A>, or <xref:System.IO.FileStream.WriteByte%2A> throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果類別衍生自<xref:System.IO.Stream>不支援寫入，呼叫<xref:System.IO.FileStream.SetLength%2A>， <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Write%2A>， <xref:System.IO.FileStream.BeginWrite%2A>，或<xref:System.IO.FileStream.WriteByte%2A>會擲回<xref:System.NotSupportedException>。

trans-unit.source: If the stream is closed, this property returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料流已關閉，則這個屬性會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the `CanWrite` property to check whether a stream supports writing.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用`CanWrite`回資料流是否支援寫入的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following is an example using the `CanWrite` property.
trans-unit.target: 下列是範例使用`CanWrite`屬性。

trans-unit.source: The output of this code is "MyFile.txt is writable."
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼的輸出是"MyFile.txt 可寫入 」。

trans-unit.source: To get the output message "MyFile.txt can be both written to and read from.", change the `FileAccess` parameter to `ReadWrite` in the `FileStream` constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得輸出訊息"MyFile.txt 可被寫入和讀取。 」，變更`FileAccess`參數`ReadWrite`中`FileStream`建構函式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> invokes the protected <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Dispose%2A> method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> 叫用受保護<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Dispose%2A>方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Dispose%2A> with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Dispose%2A>與`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.IO.FileStream> references.
trans-unit.target: `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 <xref:System.IO.FileStream> 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" /> 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.IO.FileStream.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.IO.FileStream.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中<see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see cref="M:System.IO.FileStream.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何實作<see cref="M:System.IO.FileStream.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

trans-unit.source: The reference to the pending asynchronous request to wait for.
trans-unit.target: 要等候的暫止非同步要求的參考。

trans-unit.source: Waits for the pending asynchronous read operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 等候暫止的非同步讀取作業完成。

trans-unit.source: (Consider using <see cref="M:System.IO.FileStream.ReadAsync(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)" /> instead.)
trans-unit.target: (請考慮用 <see cref="M:System.IO.FileStream.ReadAsync(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)" /> 替代。)

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes read from the stream, between 0 and the number of bytes you requested.
trans-unit.target: 自資料流讀取的位元組數，在 0 和您所要求的位元組數目之間。

trans-unit.source: Streams only return 0 at the end of the stream, otherwise, they should block until at least 1 byte is available.
trans-unit.target: 在資料流末端資料流只傳回 0，否則，他們應該封鎖直到至少有 1 位元組可用。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions, you have to use methods such as <xref:System.IO.FileStream.BeginRead%2A> and <xref:System.IO.FileStream.EndRead%2A> to implement asynchronous file operations.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 4 和舊版中，您必須使用下列方法<xref:System.IO.FileStream.BeginRead%2A>和<xref:System.IO.FileStream.EndRead%2A>實作非同步檔案作業。

trans-unit.source: These methods are still available in the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] to support legacy code; however, the new async methods, such as <xref:System.IO.FileStream.ReadAsync%2A>, <xref:System.IO.FileStream.WriteAsync%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.FileStream.FlushAsync%2A>, help you implement asynchronous file operations more easily.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法都仍有[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]以支援舊版的程式碼; 不過，新的非同步方法，例如<xref:System.IO.FileStream.ReadAsync%2A>， <xref:System.IO.FileStream.WriteAsync%2A>， <xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%2A>，和<xref:System.IO.FileStream.FlushAsync%2A>，協助您更輕鬆地實作非同步檔案作業。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.FileStream.EndRead%2A> must be called exactly for every call to <xref:System.IO.FileStream.BeginRead%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileStream.EndRead%2A> 每次呼叫必須剛好呼叫<xref:System.IO.FileStream.BeginRead%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Failing to end a read process before beginning another read can cause undesirable behavior such as deadlock.
trans-unit.target: 若要開始另一次讀取之前結束讀取的處理序失敗，可能會導致非預期的行為，例如死結。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndRead%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法覆寫 <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndRead%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.FileStream.EndRead%2A> can be called on every <xref:System.IAsyncResult> from <xref:System.IO.FileStream.BeginRead%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileStream.EndRead%2A> 可呼叫每個<xref:System.IAsyncResult>從<xref:System.IO.FileStream.BeginRead%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Calling <xref:System.IO.FileStream.EndRead%2A> tells you how many bytes were read from the stream.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.IO.FileStream.EndRead%2A>會告訴您多少位元組被讀取從資料流。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.FileStream.EndRead%2A> will block until the I/O operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileStream.EndRead%2A> 將會封鎖，直到 I/O 作業完成為止。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.IO.FileMode%2CSystem.IO.FileAccess%2CSystem.IO.FileShare%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.IO.FileStream.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.IO.FileMode%2CSystem.IO.FileAccess%2CSystem.IO.FileShare%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%29>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object was not created by calling <see cref="M:System.IO.FileStream.BeginRead(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> on this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 物件不是透過對這個類別呼叫 <see cref="M:System.IO.FileStream.BeginRead(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 所建立。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.IO.FileStream.EndRead(System.IAsyncResult)" /> is called multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 多次呼叫 <see cref="M:System.IO.FileStream.EndRead(System.IAsyncResult)" />。

trans-unit.source: The stream is closed or an internal error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 資料流已關閉或發生內部錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The pending asynchronous I/O request.
trans-unit.target: 暫止的非同步 I/O 要求。

trans-unit.source: Ends an asynchronous write operation and blocks until the I/O operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 結束非同步寫入作業並封鎖，直到 I/O 作業完成。

trans-unit.source: (Consider using <see cref="M:System.IO.FileStream.WriteAsync(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)" /> instead.)
trans-unit.target: (請考慮用 <see cref="M:System.IO.FileStream.WriteAsync(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)" /> 替代。)

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions, you have to use methods such as <xref:System.IO.FileStream.BeginWrite%2A> and <xref:System.IO.FileStream.EndWrite%2A> to implement asynchronous file operations.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 4 和舊版中，您必須使用下列方法<xref:System.IO.FileStream.BeginWrite%2A>和<xref:System.IO.FileStream.EndWrite%2A>實作非同步檔案作業。

trans-unit.source: These methods are still available in the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] to support legacy code; however, the new async methods, such as <xref:System.IO.FileStream.ReadAsync%2A>, <xref:System.IO.FileStream.WriteAsync%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.FileStream.FlushAsync%2A>, help you implement asynchronous file operations more easily.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法都仍有[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]以支援舊版的程式碼; 不過，新的非同步方法，例如<xref:System.IO.FileStream.ReadAsync%2A>， <xref:System.IO.FileStream.WriteAsync%2A>， <xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%2A>，和<xref:System.IO.FileStream.FlushAsync%2A>，協助您更輕鬆地實作非同步檔案作業。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndWrite%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法覆寫 <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndWrite%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.FileStream.EndWrite%2A> must be called exactly once on every <xref:System.IAsyncResult> from <xref:System.IO.FileStream.BeginWrite%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileStream.EndWrite%2A> 必須正好一次上呼叫每個<xref:System.IAsyncResult>從<xref:System.IO.FileStream.BeginWrite%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.FileStream.EndWrite%2A> will block until the I/O operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileStream.EndWrite%2A> 將會封鎖，直到 I/O 作業完成為止。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.IO.FileMode%2CSystem.IO.FileAccess%2CSystem.IO.FileShare%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.IO.FileStream.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.IO.FileMode%2CSystem.IO.FileAccess%2CSystem.IO.FileShare%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%29>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> object was not created by calling <see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> on this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 物件不是透過對這個類別呼叫 <see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 所建立。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.IO.FileStream.EndWrite(System.IAsyncResult)" /> is called multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 多次呼叫 <see cref="M:System.IO.FileStream.EndWrite(System.IAsyncResult)" />。

trans-unit.source: The stream is closed or an internal error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 資料流已關閉或發生內部錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that resources are freed and other cleanup operations are performed when the garbage collector reclaims the <see langword="FileStream" />.
trans-unit.target: 確認釋出資源，並在記憶體回收行程再利用 <see langword="FileStream" /> 時執行其他清除作業。

trans-unit.source: The garbage collector calls `Finalize` when the current object is ready to be finalized.
trans-unit.target: 記憶體回收行程呼叫`Finalize`準備最終處理而將目前的物件時。

trans-unit.source: `Finalize` closes the `FileStream`.
trans-unit.target: `Finalize` 關閉`FileStream`。

trans-unit.source: Clears buffers for this stream and causes any buffered data to be written to the file.
trans-unit.target: 清除這個資料流的緩衝區，讓所有緩衝資料全部寫入檔案。

trans-unit.source: Clears buffers for this stream and causes any buffered data to be written to the file.
trans-unit.target: 清除這個資料流的緩衝區，讓所有緩衝資料全部寫入檔案。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.IO.Stream.Flush%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法覆寫 <xref:System.IO.Stream.Flush%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Flush%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, the operating system I/O buffer is also flushed.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Flush%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>也會排清方法時，作業系統 I/O 緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: A stream’s encoder is not flushed unless you explicitly call <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Flush%2A> or dispose of the object.
trans-unit.target: 除非您明確地呼叫無法排清資料流編碼器<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Flush%2A>或處置物件。

trans-unit.source: Setting <xref:System.IO.StreamWriter.AutoFlush%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.IO.StreamWriter.AutoFlush%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>至`true`表示從緩衝區資料流，清除資料，但並不會清除編碼器狀態。

trans-unit.source: This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓編碼器將保存其狀態 （部分字元），讓它可以正確編碼字元的下一個區塊。

trans-unit.source: This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can only be encoded after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters.
trans-unit.target: 這種情況下會影響 UTF8 及 UTF7 其中某些字元可以只編碼的編碼器接收或多個相鄰的字元之後。

trans-unit.source: Because a buffer can be used for either reading or writing, <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Flush> performs the following two functions:
trans-unit.target: 因為緩衝區可供讀取或寫入，<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Flush>執行下列兩個功能：

trans-unit.source: Any data previously written to the buffer is copied to the file and the buffer is cleared except for its encoder state.
trans-unit.target: 任何之前寫入緩衝區的資料複製到檔案，除了其編碼器狀態清除緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.CanSeek%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is `true` and data was previously copied from the file to the buffer for reading, the current position within the file is decremented by the number of unread bytes in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.IO.BufferedStream.CanSeek%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>是`true`資料先前已從檔案複製到讀取的緩衝區，檔案中目前的位置也會減少在緩衝區中讀取的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: The buffer is then cleared.
trans-unit.target: 然後會清除緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Flush%28System.Boolean%29> method overload when you want to ensure that all buffered data in intermediate file buffers is written to disk.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Flush%28System.Boolean%29>方法多載，當您想要確保所有中繼檔案緩衝區中緩衝資料寫入至磁碟。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Lock%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Lock%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The stream is closed.
trans-unit.target: 資料流已關閉。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to flush all intermediate file buffers; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示排清所有中繼檔案緩衝區；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Clears buffers for this stream and causes any buffered data to be written to the file, and also clears all intermediate file buffers.
trans-unit.target: 清除此資料流的緩衝區，讓所有緩衝資料全部寫入檔案，同時也清除所有的中繼檔案緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload when you want to ensure that all buffered data in intermediate file buffers is written to disk.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個多載，當您想要確保所有中繼檔案緩衝區中緩衝資料寫入至磁碟。

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Flush%2A> method, the operating system I/O buffer is also flushed.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Flush%2A>也會排清方法時，作業系統 I/O 緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 用來監視是否有取消要求的語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously clears all buffers for this stream, causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device, and monitors cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步的方式清除這個資料流的所有緩衝區，造成任何緩衝資料都寫入基礎裝置，並且監視取消要求。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous flush operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示非同步排清作業的工作。

trans-unit.source: When you call the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.FlushAsync%2A> method, the operating system I/O buffer is also flushed.
trans-unit.target: 當您呼叫<xref:System.IO.FileStream.FlushAsync%2A>也會排清方法時，作業系統 I/O 緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled> value for the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果在作業完成之前將其取消，則傳回的工作包含<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>值<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the handle to the file is disposed, the returned task contains the <xref:System.ObjectDisposedException> exception in the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Exception%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果已處置的檔案控制代碼，則傳回的工作包含<xref:System.ObjectDisposedException>中的例外狀況<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Exception%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The stream has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 資料流已經處置。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity" /> object that encapsulates the access control list (ACL) entries for the file described by the current <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity" /> 物件，該物件會封裝目前 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> 物件所描述的檔案之存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目。

trans-unit.source: An object that encapsulates the access control settings for the file described by the current <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 封裝目前 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> 物件所描述檔案之存取控制設定的物件。

trans-unit.source: While the <xref:System.IO.FileStream> class and <xref:System.IO.FileStream.GetAccessControl%2A> can be used to retrieve the access control list (ACL) entries of an existing file, consider using <xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, as it is easier to use.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.IO.FileStream>類別和<xref:System.IO.FileStream.GetAccessControl%2A>可用來擷取現有檔案的存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目，請考慮使用<xref:System.IO.File.GetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，因為它比較容易使用。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.GetAccessControl%2A> method to retrieve the ACL entries for a file.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileStream.GetAccessControl%2A>方法來擷取檔案的 ACL 項目。

trans-unit.source: An ACL describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file.
trans-unit.target: ACL 描述個人及/或群組，讓他們已經有或沒有，在指定的檔案上採取特定動作的權限。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：新增或移除存取控制清單項目](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md)。

trans-unit.source: The file is closed.
trans-unit.target: 檔案已關閉。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred while opening the file.
trans-unit.target: 開啟檔案時發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The file could not be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到檔案。

trans-unit.source: This operation is not supported on the current platform.
trans-unit.target: 這個作業在目前平台不受支援。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: Gets the operating system file handle for the file that the current <see langword="FileStream" /> object encapsulates.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前 <see langword="FileStream" /> 物件封裝之檔案的作業系統檔案控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The operating system file handle for the file encapsulated by this <see langword="FileStream" /> object, or -1 if the <see langword="FileStream" /> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see langword="FileStream" /> 物件所封裝的檔案之作業系統檔案控制代碼；如果 <see langword="FileStream" /> 已關閉，則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: This property is an operating system handle for use with operating-system-provided system calls (such as `ReadFile` on Windows).
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是用於操作-系統提供的系統呼叫作業系統的控制代碼 (例如`ReadFile`Windows 上)。

trans-unit.source: It will not work with C library functions that expect a file descriptor, such as `fread`.
trans-unit.target: 它不適用於 C 程式庫函式預期的檔案描述項，例如`fread`。

trans-unit.source: The operating system handle might have been opened synchronously or asynchronously, depending on which `FileStream` constructor was called.
trans-unit.target: 作業系統控制代碼可能已經開啟同步或非同步方式，依據`FileStream`建構函式呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.IsAsync%2A> property to discover whether this handle was opened asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileStream.IsAsync%2A>屬性以探索此控制代碼是否以非同步方式開啟。

trans-unit.source: In Win32, this means the handle was opened for overlapped IO, and it requires different parameters to `ReadFile` and `WriteFile`.
trans-unit.target: 在 Win32 中，這表示控制代碼已開啟重疊的 io，而且它需要不同的參數`ReadFile`和`WriteFile`。

trans-unit.source: Data corruption might occur if a `FileStream` is created, its handle is passed, some operation moves the handle's file pointer, and then the `FileStream` is used again.
trans-unit.target: 如果，可能會發生資料損毀`FileStream`已建立，其控制代碼傳遞時，某些作業移動控制代碼的檔案指標，然後`FileStream`會再次使用。

trans-unit.source: Multiple threads cannot safely write to the same file simultaneously, and `FileStream` buffering code assumes that it exclusively controls the handle.
trans-unit.target: 多個執行緒安全地無法同時寫入相同的檔案和`FileStream`緩衝處理程式碼會假設它以獨佔方式控制控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: `FileStream` might throw an <xref:System.IO.IOException> if `FileStream` detects that some other process has moved the file pointer.
trans-unit.target: `FileStream` 可能會擲回<xref:System.IO.IOException>如果`FileStream`偵測到某些其他處理序已移動檔案指標。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this, do not write any data into a portion of the file that `FileStream` might have buffered, and restore the file pointer to the location it had when methods were last called on `FileStream`.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免這個問題，請勿不寫入任何資料檔案的一部分，`FileStream`可能必須緩衝處理，並在上次呼叫了方法時發生的位置還原的檔案指標`FileStream`。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have the required permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有必要的權限。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to access unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 提供存取 unmanaged 程式碼的能力。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" /> Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別相關聯：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />安全性動作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.InheritanceDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see langword="FileStream" /> was opened asynchronously or synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出 <see langword="FileStream" /> 為非同步或同步開啟。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see langword="FileStream" /> was opened asynchronously; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="FileStream" /> 是非同步開啟，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The `IsAsync` property detects whether the `FileStream` handle was opened asynchronously, enabling your code to use the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Handle%2A> property correctly.
trans-unit.target: `IsAsync`屬性會偵測是否`FileStream`控制代碼開啟時以非同步的方式，讓您的程式碼使用<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Handle%2A>屬性正確。

trans-unit.source: In Win32, `IsAsync` being true means the handle was opened for overlapped I/O, and thus requires different parameters to `ReadFile` and `WriteFile`.
trans-unit.target: 在 Win32 中，`IsAsync`正在 true 表示控制代碼的重疊 I/O，已開啟，並因此而需要不同的參數來`ReadFile`和`WriteFile`。

trans-unit.source: You specify this value when you create an instance of the <xref:System.IO.FileStream> class using a constructor that has an `isAsync`, `useAsync`, or `options` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立的執行個體時，指定這個值<xref:System.IO.FileStream>類別使用的建構函式`isAsync`， `useAsync`，或`options`參數。

trans-unit.source: When the property is `true`, the stream utilizes overlapped I/O to perform file operations asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 若屬性是`true`，資料流使用重疊的 I/O，以非同步方式執行檔案作業。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.IsAsync%2A> property does not have to be `true` to call the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.ReadAsync%2A>, <xref:System.IO.FileStream.WriteAsync%2A>, or <xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:System.IO.FileStream.IsAsync%2A>屬性不一定要`true`呼叫<xref:System.IO.FileStream.ReadAsync%2A>， <xref:System.IO.FileStream.WriteAsync%2A>，或<xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.IsAsync%2A> property is `false` and you call the asynchronous read and write operations, the UI thread is still not blocked, but the actual I/O operation is performed synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.IO.FileStream.IsAsync%2A>屬性是`false`和呼叫的非同步讀取和寫入作業，仍不封鎖 UI 執行緒，但實際的 I/O 作業會以同步方式執行。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.IO.FileMode%2CSystem.IO.FileAccess%2CSystem.IO.FileShare%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.IO.FileStream.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.IO.FileMode%2CSystem.IO.FileAccess%2CSystem.IO.FileShare%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%29>建構函式。

trans-unit.target: 取得資料流的位元組長度。

trans-unit.source: A long value representing the length of the stream in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 代表資料流長度的長數值 (以位元組為單位)。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error, such as the file being closed, occurred.
trans-unit.target: 發生 I/O 錯誤，例如檔案已關閉。

trans-unit.source: The beginning of the range to lock.
trans-unit.target: 鎖定的範圍開頭。

trans-unit.source: The value of this parameter must be equal to or greater than zero (0).
trans-unit.target: 這個參數的值必須等於或大於零 (0)。

trans-unit.source: The range to be locked.
trans-unit.target: 要鎖定的範圍。

trans-unit.source: Prevents other processes from reading from or writing to the <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" />.
trans-unit.target: 防止其他處理程序讀取或寫入 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" />。

trans-unit.source: Locking a range of a file stream gives the threads of the locking process exclusive access to that range of the file stream.
trans-unit.target: 鎖定某個範圍的檔案資料流可讓執行緒的鎖定的處理程序的獨佔存取該範圍的檔案資料流。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common file and directory operations, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需常見的檔案和目錄作業的清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何鎖定檔案的一部分，因此即使檔案有讀取/寫入存取另一個處理序無法存取該檔案的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Run the program simultaneously in different command windows and investigate using the different console input options.
trans-unit.target: 在不同的命令視窗中同時執行的程式，並調查使用不同的主控台輸入的選項。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="position" /> 或 <paramref name="length" /> 為負。

trans-unit.source: The file is closed.
trans-unit.target: 檔案已關閉。

trans-unit.source: The process cannot access the file because another process has locked a portion of the file.
trans-unit.target: 處理序無法存取檔案，因為其他處理序鎖定了該檔案的一部分。

trans-unit.target: 取得傳遞給建構函式的 <see langword="FileStream" /> 名稱。

trans-unit.target: <see langword="FileStream" /> 名稱的字串。

trans-unit.target: 如需常見的檔案和目錄作業的清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.IO.FileStream.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.IO.FileMode%2CSystem.IO.FileAccess%2CSystem.IO.FileShare%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Boolean%29>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: for access to the path.
trans-unit.target: 為路徑的存取權。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermissionAccess.PathDiscovery" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current position of this stream.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個資料流的目前位置。

trans-unit.source: The current position of this stream.
trans-unit.target: 這個資料流的目前位置。

trans-unit.source: Seeking to any location beyond the length of the stream is supported.
trans-unit.target: 支援搜尋到的任何位置超出資料流的長度。

trans-unit.source: When you seek beyond the length of the file, the file size grows.
trans-unit.target: 當您搜尋檔案的長度超過檔案大小會成長。

trans-unit.source: In Microsoft Windows NT and newer, any data added to the end of the file is set to zero.
trans-unit.target: 在 Microsoft Windows NT 及更新版本，新增至檔案結尾的所有資料都設為零。

trans-unit.source: In Microsoft Windows 98 or earlier, any data added to the end of the file is not set to zero, which means that previously deleted data is visible to the stream.
trans-unit.target: 在 Microsoft Windows 98 或更早版本，新增至檔案結尾的所有資料未設定為零，表示先前已刪除的資料會顯示資料流。

trans-unit.source: Setting the position of the stream to a large value beyond the end of the stream in Windows 98 or earlier may result in an exception being raised.
trans-unit.target: 將資料流的位置設定為較大的值，在 Windows 98 或更早版本的資料流的結尾之外，可能會導致引發例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common file and directory operations, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需常見的檔案和目錄作業的清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the `Length` and `Position` properties to check for an end-of-file condition.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用`Length`和`Position`屬性，以檢查檔案結尾條件。

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support seeking.
trans-unit.target: 資料流不支援搜尋。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The position was set to a very large value beyond the end of the stream in Windows 98 or earlier.
trans-unit.target: 位置設為非常大的值，超出 Windows 98 或更早版本的資料流結尾。

trans-unit.source: Attempted to set the position to a negative value.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將位置設為負數值。

trans-unit.source: Attempted seeking past the end of a stream that does not support this.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試搜尋超過資料流的結尾，但不支援此作業。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the specified byte array with the values between <c>offset</c> and (<c>offset</c> + <c>count</c> - 1<c>)</c> replaced by the bytes read from the current source.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，會包含其值介於 <c>offset</c> 和 (<c>offset</c> + <c>count</c> - 1<c>)</c> 之間，並由讀取自目前來源的位元組取代的指定位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: The byte offset in <c>array</c> at which the read bytes will be placed.
trans-unit.target: 「陣列」<c></c>中的位元組位移，即放置讀取位元組的位置。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取的最大位元組數。

trans-unit.source: Reads a block of bytes from the stream and writes the data in a given buffer.
trans-unit.target: 從資料流讀取位元組區塊，並將資料寫入指定緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The total number of bytes read into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 緩衝區所讀取的總位元組數。

trans-unit.source: This might be less than the number of bytes requested if that number of bytes are not currently available, or zero if the end of the stream is reached.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前無法提供那麼多的位元組數目，則這個數目可能小於所要求的位元組數；如果已經到達資料流末端，則為零。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.IO.Stream.Read%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法覆寫 <xref:System.IO.Stream.Read%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The `offset` parameter gives the offset of the byte in `array` (the buffer index) at which to begin reading, and the `count` parameter gives the maximum number of bytes to be read from this stream.
trans-unit.target: `offset`參數會提供中的位元組位移`array`（緩衝區索引） 中要開始閱讀，而`count`參數指定要從這個資料流讀取的位元組數目上限。

trans-unit.source: The returned value is the actual number of bytes read, or zero if the end of the stream is reached.
trans-unit.target: 如果已到達資料流結尾，傳回的值會是個位元組，則為零的實際數目。

trans-unit.source: If the read operation is successful, the current position of the stream is advanced by the number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: 如果在讀取的作業成功，讀取的位元組數目進階資料流的目前位置。

trans-unit.source: If an exception occurs, the current position of the stream is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生例外狀況，目前資料流的位置不變。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Read%2A> method returns zero only after reaching the end of the stream.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Read%2A>方法會傳回零只到達資料流結尾之後。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Read%2A> always reads at least one byte from the stream before returning.
trans-unit.target: 否則，<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Read%2A>一律會讀取至少一個位元組資料流後再傳回。

trans-unit.source: If no data is available from the stream upon a call to <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Read%2A>, the method will block until at least one byte of data can be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有資料可從呼叫時，資料流<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Read%2A>，方法會封鎖直到至少一個位元組的資料可能會傳回。

trans-unit.source: An implementation is free to return fewer bytes than requested even if the end of the stream has not been reached.
trans-unit.target: 實作可以自由地傳回比要求的位元組更少，即使尚未達到資料流結尾。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.IO.BinaryReader> for reading primitive data types.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.BinaryReader>讀取基本資料型別。

trans-unit.source: Do not interrupt a thread that is performing a read operation.
trans-unit.target: 不會中斷正在執行讀取的作業的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Although the application may appear to run successfully after the thread is unblocked, the interruption can decrease your application's performance and reliability.
trans-unit.target: 雖然應用程式或許可以順利執行之後，執行緒會封鎖，您的應用程式效能和可靠性，就可能會降低發生中斷。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common file and directory operations, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需常見的檔案和目錄作業的清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example reads the contents from a <xref:System.IO.FileStream> and writes it into another <xref:System.IO.FileStream>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會讀取內容從<xref:System.IO.FileStream>並將它寫入至另一個<xref:System.IO.FileStream>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> or <paramref name="count" /> is negative.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 或 <paramref name="count" /> 為負。

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support reading.
trans-unit.target: 資料流不支援讀取。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> and <paramref name="count" /> describe an invalid range in <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 描述 <paramref name="array" /> 中的無效範圍。

trans-unit.source: Methods were called after the stream was closed.
trans-unit.target: 關閉資料流後呼叫了方法。

trans-unit.source: The buffer to write the data into.
trans-unit.target: 寫入資料的緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The byte offset in <c>buffer</c> at which to begin writing data from the stream.
trans-unit.target: 「緩衝區」<c></c> 中的位元組位移，即要開始從資料流寫入資料的位置。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to read.
trans-unit.target: 要讀取的最大位元組數。

trans-unit.source: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 用來監視是否有取消要求的語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream, advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read, and monitors cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步的方式從目前資料流讀取一連串的位元組、依所讀取的位元組數目進階資料流中的位置，以及監視取消要求。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示非同步讀取作業的工作。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <paramref name="TResult" /> parameter contains the total number of bytes read into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="TResult" /> 參數的值會包含讀取至緩衝區的位元組總數。

trans-unit.source: The result value can be less than the number of bytes requested if the number of bytes currently available is less than the requested number, or it can be 0 (zero) if the end of the stream has been reached.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前可供使用的位元組數目少於所要求的數目，結果值可能會小於所要求的位元組數目，或者如果已經到達資料流末端，則可能為 0 (零)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileStream.ReadAsync%2A> method enables you to perform resource-intensive file operations without blocking the main thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileStream.ReadAsync%2A>方法可讓您執行需要大量資源的檔案作業，而不會封鎖主執行緒。

trans-unit.source: This performance consideration is particularly important in a [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] app or [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working.
trans-unit.target: 這項效能考量對於 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 應用程式或 [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] 應用程式而言特別重要，尤其是針對耗時的資料流作業可能會阻礙 UI 執行緒，使應用程式看起來像是停止運作的情況。

trans-unit.source: The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#.
trans-unit.target: 非同步方法會用於搭配`async`和`await`Visual Basic 和 C# 中的關鍵字。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanRead%2A> property to determine whether the current instance supports reading.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanRead%2A>屬性來判斷目前的執行個體是否支援讀取。

trans-unit.source: If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled> value for the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果在作業完成之前將其取消，則傳回的工作包含<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>值<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the handle to the file is disposed, the returned task contains the <xref:System.ObjectDisposedException> exception in the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Exception%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果已處置的檔案控制代碼，則傳回的工作包含<xref:System.ObjectDisposedException>中的例外狀況<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Exception%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to read from a file asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何以非同步方式從檔案讀取。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> or <paramref name="count" /> is negative.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 或 <paramref name="count" /> 為負。

trans-unit.source: The sum of <paramref name="offset" /> and <paramref name="count" /> is larger than the buffer length.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 的總和大於緩衝區長度。

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support reading.
trans-unit.target: 資料流不支援讀取。

trans-unit.source: The stream has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 資料流已經處置。

trans-unit.source: The stream is currently in use by a previous read operation.
trans-unit.target: 之前的讀取作業目前正在使用資料流。

trans-unit.source: Reads a byte from the file and advances the read position one byte.
trans-unit.target: 從檔案讀取一個位元組，並將讀取位置前移一個位元組。

trans-unit.source: The byte, cast to an <see cref="T:System.Int32" />, or -1 if the end of the stream has been reached.
trans-unit.target: 轉換為 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 的位元組，如果已經到達資料流的末端，則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadByte%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法覆寫 <xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadByte%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanRead%2A> property to determine whether the current instance supports reading.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanRead%2A>屬性來判斷目前的執行個體是否支援讀取。

trans-unit.source: For additional information, see <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanRead%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanRead%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to write data to a file, byte by byte, and then verify that the data was written correctly.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何寫入資料到檔案時，位元組，並確認資料已正確寫入。

trans-unit.source: The current stream does not support reading.
trans-unit.target: 目前的資料流不支援讀取。

trans-unit.source: The current stream is closed.
trans-unit.target: 目前的資料流已關閉。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation on <see langword="Stream" /> creates a new single-byte array and then calls <see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.Read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)" />.
trans-unit.target: 上的預設實作<see langword="Stream" />建立新的單一位元組陣列，然後呼叫<see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.Read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)" />。

trans-unit.source: While this is formally correct, it is inefficient.
trans-unit.target: 雖然這是正式正確，就沒有效率。

trans-unit.source: Any stream with an internal buffer should override this method and provide a much more efficient version that reads the buffer directly, avoiding the extra array allocation on every call.
trans-unit.target: 任何內部緩衝區的資料流應該覆寫這個方法，並提供更有效率的版本會直接讀取緩衝區，避免在每次呼叫配置額外的陣列。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the operating system file handle for the file that the current <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> object encapsulates.
trans-unit.target: 代表目前 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> 物件封裝之檔案的作業系統檔案控制代碼的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileStream.SafeFileHandle%2A> property automatically flushes the stream and sets the current stream position to 0.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileStream.SafeFileHandle%2A>屬性自動排清資料流，並將目前資料流位置設定為 0。

trans-unit.source: This allows the file to be moved or the stream position to be reset by another stream using the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.SafeFileHandle%2A> returned by this property.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓要移動檔案或另一個資料流使用會重設資料流位置<xref:System.IO.FileStream.SafeFileHandle%2A>這個屬性所傳回。

trans-unit.source: for permission to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的權限。

trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: The point relative to <c>origin</c> from which to begin seeking.
trans-unit.target: 相對於「原點」<c></c>的搜尋起點。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the beginning, the end, or the current position as a reference point for <c>offset</c>, using a value of type <see cref="T:System.IO.SeekOrigin" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用類型 <see cref="T:System.IO.SeekOrigin" /> 的值，指定開頭、結尾或目前位置作為「位移」<c></c>的參考點。

trans-unit.source: Sets the current position of this stream to the given value.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個資料流的目前位置為指定的數值。

trans-unit.source: The new position in the stream.
trans-unit.target: 資料流中的新位置。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.IO.Stream.Seek%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法覆寫 <xref:System.IO.Stream.Seek%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanSeek%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to determine whether the current instance supports seeking.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanSeek%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性來判斷目前的執行個體是否支援搜尋。

trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: You can seek to any location beyond the length of the stream.
trans-unit.target: 您可以搜尋到的任何位置超出資料流的長度。

trans-unit.source: When you seek beyond the length of the file, the file size grows.
trans-unit.target: 當您搜尋檔案的長度超過檔案大小會成長。

trans-unit.source: In Windows NT and later versions, data added to the end of the file is set to zero.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows NT 和更新版本中，資料檔案的結尾處加入設為零。

trans-unit.source: In Windows 98 or earlier versions, data added to the end of the file is not set to zero, which means that previously deleted data is visible to the stream.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 98 或更早版本中，新增到檔案結尾的資料未設定為零，表示先前已刪除的資料會顯示資料流。

trans-unit.source: The following example reads text in the reverse direction, from the end of file to the beginning of the file, by using the various <xref:System.IO.SeekOrigin> values with the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.Seek%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用各種檔案結尾開頭的檔案，請從讀取文字方向會相反，<xref:System.IO.SeekOrigin>值與<xref:System.IO.FileStream.Seek%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support seeking, such as if the <see langword="FileStream" /> is constructed from a pipe or console output.
trans-unit.target: 資料流不支援搜尋，例如，如果 <see langword="FileStream" /> 為從管道或主控台輸出所建構。

trans-unit.source: Seeking is attempted before the beginning of the stream.
trans-unit.target: 在資料流開始之前嘗試搜尋。

trans-unit.source: Methods were called after the stream was closed.
trans-unit.target: 關閉資料流後呼叫了方法。

trans-unit.source: An object that describes an ACL entry to apply to the current file.
trans-unit.target: 物件，描述要套用至目前檔案的 ACL 項目。

trans-unit.source: Applies access control list (ACL) entries described by a <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity" /> object to the file described by the current <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Security.AccessControl.FileSecurity" /> 物件所描述的存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目套用至目前 <see cref="T:System.IO.FileStream" /> 物件所描述的檔案。

trans-unit.source: While the <xref:System.IO.FileStream> class and <xref:System.IO.FileStream.SetAccessControl%2A> can be used on an existing file, consider using the <xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method as it is easier to use.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.IO.FileStream>類別和<xref:System.IO.FileStream.SetAccessControl%2A>可以用於現有的檔案，請考慮使用<xref:System.IO.File.SetAccessControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，因為它比較容易使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileStream.SetAccessControl%2A> method applies access control list (ACL) entries to a file that represents the noninherited ACL list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileStream.SetAccessControl%2A>方法適用於代表 noninherited 的 ACL 清單的檔案存取控制清單 (ACL) 項目。

trans-unit.source: The ACL specified for the `fileSecurity` parameter replaces the existing ACL for the file.
trans-unit.target: 指定 ACL`fileSecurity`參數已取代現有檔案的 ACL。

trans-unit.source: To add permissions for a new user, use the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.GetAccessControl%2A> method to obtain the existing ACL, modify it, and then use <xref:System.IO.FileStream.SetAccessControl%2A> to apply it back to the file.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入之新使用者的權限，請使用<xref:System.IO.FileStream.GetAccessControl%2A>方法來取得現有的 ACL，修改它，然後使用<xref:System.IO.FileStream.SetAccessControl%2A>套用回到檔案。

trans-unit.source: An ACL describes individuals and/or groups who have, or do not have, rights to specific actions on the given file.
trans-unit.target: ACL 描述個人及/或群組，讓他們已經有或沒有，在指定的檔案上採取特定動作的權限。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Add or Remove Access Control List Entries](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：新增或移除存取控制清單項目](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-add-or-remove-access-control-list-entries.md)。

trans-unit.source: The file is closed.
trans-unit.target: 檔案已關閉。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="fileSecurity" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="fileSecurity" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The file could not be found or modified.
trans-unit.target: 找不到或無法修改檔案。

trans-unit.source: The current process does not have access to open the file.
trans-unit.target: 目前的處理序不具有開啟檔案的存取權。

trans-unit.source: The new length of the stream.
trans-unit.target: 資料流的新長度。

trans-unit.source: Sets the length of this stream to the given value.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個資料流長度為指定的數值。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.IO.Stream.SetLength%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法覆寫 <xref:System.IO.Stream.SetLength%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If the given value is less than the current length of the stream, the stream is truncated.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的值小於目前資料流的長度，則會截斷資料流。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, if the current position is greater than the new length, the current position is moved to the last byte of the stream.
trans-unit.target: 在此案例中，如果目前的位置是新的長度大於目前的位置會移至最後一個資料流的位元組。

trans-unit.source: If the given value is larger than the current length of the stream, the stream is expanded, and the current position remains the same.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前資料流的長度大於指定的值，擴充的資料流，及目前的位置維持不變。

trans-unit.source: If the stream is expanded, the contents of the stream between the old and the new length are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果展開資料流時，舊之間的新長度的資料流的內容會是未定義。

trans-unit.source: A stream must support both writing and seeking for `SetLength` to work.
trans-unit.target: 資料流必須支援寫入和搜尋的`SetLength`運作。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite%2A> property to determine whether the current instance supports writing, and the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanSeek%2A> property to determine whether seeking is supported.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite%2A>屬性來判斷目前的執行個體是否支援寫入，而<xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanSeek%2A>屬性來判斷是否支援搜尋。

trans-unit.source: For additional information, see <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanWrite%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanWrite%2A> 和 <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to lock part of a file so another process cannot access that part of the file even though it has read/write access to the file, and then unlock the specified part of the file .

trans-unit.target: 在不同的命令視窗中同時執行的程式，並調查使用不同的主控台輸入的選項。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="position" /> or <paramref name="length" /> is negative.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="position" /> 或 <paramref name="length" /> 為負。

trans-unit.source: The buffer containing data to write to the stream.
trans-unit.target: 包含要寫入資料流之資料的緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based byte offset in <c>array</c> from which to begin copying bytes to the stream.
trans-unit.target: 「陣列」<c></c>中以零為起始的位元組位移，即要開始將位元組複製到資料流的來源位置。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to write.
trans-unit.target: 寫入的最大位元組數。

trans-unit.source: Writes a block of bytes to the file stream.
trans-unit.target: 將位元組區塊寫入檔案資料流中。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.IO.Stream.Write%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法覆寫 <xref:System.IO.Stream.Write%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The `offset` parameter gives the offset of the byte in `array` (the buffer index) at which to begin copying, and the `count` parameter gives the number of bytes that will be written to the stream.
trans-unit.target: `offset`參數會提供中的位元組位移`array`（緩衝區索引） 中要開始複製，而`count`參數指定將寫入資料流的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: If the write operation is successful, the current position of the stream is advanced by the number of bytes written.
trans-unit.target: 如果作業成功時，寫入的位元組數目進階資料流的目前位置。

trans-unit.source: If an exception occurs, the current position of the stream is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生例外狀況，目前資料流的位置不變。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite%2A> property to determine whether the current instance supports writing.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite%2A>屬性來判斷目前的執行個體是否支援寫入。

trans-unit.source: For additional information, see <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanWrite%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanWrite%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Do not interrupt a thread that is performing a write operation.
trans-unit.target: 不會中斷正在執行寫入作業的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: Although the application may appear to run successfully after the thread is unblocked, the interruption can decrease your application's performance and reliability.
trans-unit.target: 雖然應用程式或許可以順利執行之後，執行緒會封鎖，您的應用程式效能和可靠性，就可能會降低發生中斷。

trans-unit.target: 如需常見的檔案和目錄作業的清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 發生 I/O 錯誤。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
Another thread may have caused an unexpected change in the position of the operating system's file handle.
trans-unit.target: 另一個執行緒可能會在作業系統之檔案控制代碼的位置，造成未預期的變更。

trans-unit.source: The stream is closed.
trans-unit.target: 資料流已關閉。

trans-unit.source: The current stream instance does not support writing.
trans-unit.target: 目前的資料流執行個體不支援寫入。

trans-unit.source: The buffer to write data from.
trans-unit.target: 寫入資料的來源緩衝區。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based byte offset in <c>buffer</c> from which to begin copying bytes to the stream.
trans-unit.target: 「緩衝區」<c></c>中以零為起始的位元組位移，即要開始將位元組複製到資料流的來源位置。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to write.
trans-unit.target: 寫入的最大位元組數。

trans-unit.source: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 用來監視是否有取消要求的語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously writes a sequence of bytes to the current stream, advances the current position within this stream by the number of bytes written, and monitors cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步的方式將一連串的位元組寫入目前的資料流，由這個資料流中目前的位置前移寫入的位元組數目，並且監視取消要求。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示非同步寫入作業的工作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileStream.WriteAsync%2A> method enables you to perform resource-intensive file operations without blocking the main thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileStream.WriteAsync%2A>方法可讓您執行需要大量資源的檔案作業，而不會封鎖主執行緒。

trans-unit.source: This performance consideration is particularly important in a [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] app or [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working.
trans-unit.target: 這項效能考量對於 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 應用程式或 [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] 應用程式而言特別重要，尤其是針對耗時的資料流作業可能會阻礙 UI 執行緒，使應用程式看起來像是停止運作的情況。

trans-unit.source: The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#.
trans-unit.target: 非同步方法會用於搭配`async`和`await`Visual Basic 和 C# 中的關鍵字。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite%2A> property to determine whether the current instance supports reading.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite%2A>屬性來判斷目前的執行個體是否支援讀取。

trans-unit.source: If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled> value for the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果在作業完成之前將其取消，則傳回的工作包含<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>值<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the handle to the file is disposed, the returned task contains the <xref:System.ObjectDisposedException> exception in the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Exception%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果已處置的檔案控制代碼，則傳回的工作包含<xref:System.ObjectDisposedException>中的例外狀況<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Exception%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to write asynchronously to a file.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何以非同步方式寫入檔案。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> or <paramref name="count" /> is negative.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 或 <paramref name="count" /> 為負。

trans-unit.source: The sum of <paramref name="offset" /> and <paramref name="count" /> is larger than the buffer length.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 的總和大於緩衝區長度。

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support writing.
trans-unit.target: 資料流不支援寫入。

trans-unit.source: The stream has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已處置此資料流。

trans-unit.source: The stream is currently in use by a previous write operation.
trans-unit.target: 之前的寫入作業目前正在使用資料流。

trans-unit.source: A byte to write to the stream.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入資料流的位元組。

trans-unit.source: Writes a byte to the current position in the file stream.
trans-unit.target: 寫入一個位元組到檔案資料流中的目前位置。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteByte%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法覆寫 <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteByte%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Use `WriteByte` to write a byte to a `FileStream` efficiently.
trans-unit.target: 使用`WriteByte`寫入一個位元組至`FileStream`有效率。

trans-unit.source: If the stream is closed or not writable, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料流已關閉或沒有可寫入，就會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite%2A> property to determine whether the current instance supports writing.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite%2A>屬性來判斷目前的執行個體是否支援寫入。

trans-unit.source: For additional information, see <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanWrite%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanWrite%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to write data to a file, byte by byte, and then verify that the data was written correctly.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何寫入資料到檔案時，位元組，並確認資料已正確寫入。

trans-unit.source: The stream is closed.
trans-unit.target: 資料流已關閉。

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support writing.
trans-unit.target: 資料流不支援寫入。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation on <see langword="Stream" /> creates a new single-byte array and then calls <see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.Write(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)" />.
trans-unit.target: 上的預設實作<see langword="Stream" />建立新的單一位元組陣列，然後呼叫<see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.Write(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)" />。

trans-unit.source: While this is formally correct, it is inefficient.
trans-unit.target: 雖然這是正式正確，就沒有效率。

trans-unit.source: Any stream with an internal buffer should override this method and provide a much more efficient version that reads the buffer directly, avoiding the extra array allocation on every call.
trans-unit.target: 任何內部緩衝區的資料流應該覆寫這個方法，並提供更有效率的版本會直接讀取緩衝區，避免在每次呼叫配置額外的陣列。

trans-unit.source: For a list of common file and directory operations, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需常見的檔案和目錄作業的清單，請參閱[一般 I/O 工作](~/docs/standard/io/common-i-o-tasks.md)。
